Aba baturage bavuga ko bava mu midugudu bijejwe ibikorwa remezo cyane cyane amazi n’amashanyarazi, amazi yo ngo yabagezeho ariko bahora bategereje amashanyarazi.

Aba baturage kandi banasuzumwe indwara z’amenyo, banigishwa uburyo bwiza bwo kuyasukura, inshuro bigomba gukorwa ku munsi, banakangurirwa kugira umuco wo kujya kwa muganga.
Aba baturage kandi bashingiye ku bandi basigaye ku rutonde, bavuga ko hashobora kuba harabayemo uburiganya.
Aba baturage, kuri bo, umugoroba w’ababyeyi, wababereye umuyoboro wo guca imirire mibi.
Aba baturage yababwiye imigabo n’imigambi ye muby’ubukungu, imibereho, hanyuma abaturage bamubaza ibibazo kubyo yari amaze kuvuga.

Ababyeyi bagomba kubaganiriza ku mateka y’igihugu nta kuyagoreka.

Abaregwa bahawe umwanya wo kwiregura maze Ishimwe yemera ibyaha byose ashinjwa, avuga ko yarashe nyakwigendera bitewe n’uko yari abonye atuye hasi mugenzi we ndetse ashaka kumwambura imbunda.
Abaregwa basomewe ibyaha bashinjwa n’ubushinjacyaha bwa gisirikare aribyo; Ubufatanyacyaha mu bwicanyi, ubwambuzi bukoresheje kiboko, ubugande, kurasa nta tegeko no konona ikintu cy’undi ku bw’inabi.
Abaregwa bo iki cyifuzo ntibagikozwa, banga ko urubanza rwabo rujya mu muhezo kubera ko ngo mbere rwashyizwe mu muhezo hagikorwa iperereza.
Abaregwa ntabari bitabye uretse umwe mu banyamategeko bunganira Evode IMENA wari uri mu cyumba cy’iburanisha.
Abarezi ubundi ni abana b’Imana ni yo mpamvu bahora basa neza.
Abari aho bamubaza niba ari umukozi w’Imana arabibemerera bamusaba kumusengera, agira abwoba ariko nyuma arabikora.
Abari babashije kuyatanga mu mezi 30 buri umwe yari yatanze ibihumbi 300. Muri iyo misanzu ya buri kwezi ngo ni ho haguzwe ibikoresho binyuranye byo mu biro ndetse no gukodesha inzu bakoreramo, ikodeshwa amafaranga ibihumbi 190 ku kwezi.
Abari bateraniye aho bose barumiwe ariko bafashwa n’ubuhamya bw’uyu muryango.
Abari guhugurwa bazagira uruhare rugaragara mugukora ubuvugizi, kongera ibitekerezo byâ€™icyakorwa ngo hongerwe ingengo yâ€™imari igenerwa abana.
Abari gukarishya ubwenge ni abasirikare, abapolisi ndetse n’abasivili, bose hamwe ni 40. Ni abo muri: Comoros, Kenya, Uganda, Sudani, Sudani y’epfo, Somaliya n’u Rwanda.
Abari i Burundi mutubwire uko tworiha Mudufashe kwishyura byananiranye Uyu mugabo wahaye akazi clovis ni Jules tuu,ntiyapfuye,umuseke muri abambere gusa kwishyura byanze kubantu batari mu rwanda murebe icyo mwadufasha.
Abarimu bapapira usanga bakoresha projection naza PPS basoma ngo bari gusobanura.
Abari mu bitaro nk’uwaraye arwaye, awakoze impanuka, ntabwo tuzashyira ibiro by’itora ku bitaro”.
Abarimu n’abahanga mu mateka y’u Rwanda, bahora mu gihirahiro cyo gusabwa na buri mutegetsi wimye ingoma gushyira iruhande ibyo bize banazi neza, bakigisha ibyo abo banyapolitiki bifuza bijyanye n’inyungu zabo n’uko bashaka kwiyerekana.
Abarimu na bo bavuga ko bitaborohera kubona uko babyaza umusaruro iyi nguzanyo kuko igihe kinini bakimara bari mu kazi ko gutanga uburere.
Abari muri aya matora bari bambaye bajyanishije imyambaro ya RPF Inkotanyi.
Abari muri iyi modoka bari bagiye mu gikorwa cyo kwamamaza umukandida wa FPR Inkotanyi mu turere twa Nyagatare, Gatsibo na Kayonza aho ari bwiyamamarize uyu munsi.
Abari muri iyi myanya basezeye mu mirimo yabo ni: Nkurunziza Gustave wari Perezida, Uwera Jeannette wari usanzwe ari umubitsi w’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Volleyball ndetse na Ribanje Jean Pierre wari Visi Perezida wa kabiri.
Abari n’abategarugori benshi bashakira ubwiza mu gukoresha amavuta atandukanye, bakibagirwa ko uturemangingo tw’uruhu dukoze mubyo umuntu aba yariye.

Abarobyi ngo nyuma y’amajoro bahiga amafi bakurikizaho kujya mu ndaya Abarobyi bafite imiryango usanga ngo bashobora kumara ukwezi batagera mu rugo baraje kuroba aha hantu kubera ko badatuye hafi yaho.
Abarokotse ariko banashimiye bamwe mu baturage babaye intwari bakabasha kurokora Abatutsi bahigwaga bakabambutsa muri Congo.
Abarokotse Jenoside bo muri aka Karere ka kabiri mu Rwanda gafite ingengabitekerezo nyinshi, nyuma y’imyaka 23 barashima ko hari ibyo Leta yabafashije, ariko nanone ngo intambwe iracyari ndende.
Abarokotse Jenoside twabazaniye ibiribwa n’ibikoresho by’isuku, uyu munsi twaremeye imiryango 70”.
Abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi bo mu murenge wa Kinazi, Akarere ka Ruhango barasaba Leta gukurikirana abarundi bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi bagashyikirizwa ubutabera.

Abarushye n’abaremerewe bose nibasange Yesu abaruhure.
Abarwanashyaka ba PSD bagera kuri 700 bitabiriye iyi nama rusange bahise bahaguruka bemeza ko bashyigikiye uyu mwanzuro.
Abarwanyi ba M23 mu nkambi muri Uganda Muri aba basaga 1300 bari barajyanywe muri iyi nkambi, 19 nibo bizwi ko bajyanywe kuvururirwa mu bitaro bya gisirikare bya Bombo, icyenda bizwi ko bapfuye kuva mu 2013 bagezwa muri Uganda.
Abarwayi 201 bangana na 100.5% babazwe indwara zinyuranye mu gihe mbere bateganyaga ko nibura bazafasha abantu 200 bari bakeneye kubagwa.
Abarwayi ba diabete, muri Sebamed hari amavuta afasha uruhu rwataguritse kongera gusubirana kimwe n’abarwaye imyate cyangwa abafite iminkanyari.
Abarwayi b’impyiko bo mu Karere ka Rusizi bajyaga bivuriza mu Bitaro bya Gisenyi, ibya Kaminuza bya Butare(CHUB), Ibitaro byitiriwe Umwami Faysal n’ibya Kaminuza bya Kigali(CHUK).
Abarwayi bo mutwe batabyemera bo ni benshi ku Isi no mu Rwanda turabafite kandi bose batinyutse bakamutora mwaba mureba amajwi yagira uko yaba angana.
Abarwayi bose bagomba kuvurwa n’abantu babifitiye ubumenyi n’ubushobozi bihagije bituma batahungabanya ubuzima bwabo.
Abaryamana bahuje ibitsina muri Uganda batangiye gushaka gukora cyane ku mugaragaro muri 2013 bituma Leta ishyiraho itegeko rihanisha igihano cya burundu umuntu wese uhamwe n’icyaha cy’ubutinganyi, risinywa na Perezida Museveni muri Gashyantare 2014.
Abaryigamo bafata amasomo mu gihe cy’imyaka itatu bigishwa n’inzobere muri muzika zabyize cyane cyane mu mahanga.
Abasaga ijana muri 523 basoje itorero basabye kwinjira mu gisirikari Icyiciro cya 10 cy’Itorero Indangamirwa cyari kimaze ukwezi gitorezwa mu Kigo cya Gisirikari cya Gabiro, cyasojwe kuri uyu wa 13 Nyakanga 2017.
Abasanzwe bategura ibitaramo bo mu Rwanda babwiye Izuba Rirashe ko bamaze igihe bari mu biganiro n’itsinda rikomeye ryo muri Amerika rya “Live Nation” rifasha aba bahanzi mu gutegura ibitaramo hirya no hino ku Isi.

Abashakaga kwiga yahise ajya kubashakira ishuri, abandi abajyana mu mashuri y’imyuga, abandi akabafasha kwagura impano zibarimo nko kuririmba, gushushanya, gukina amakinamico no kumurika imideli.
Abashakanye badategura imibonano yabo neza bigira ingaruka mu mibanire yabo aho usanga bagira amakimbirane ugasanga bahora muntonganya gusa, ndetse bamwe bikabaviramo dutandukana cyangwa kwicana.
Abashakashatsi bagize bati “Uretse kuba batsinda neza mu ishuri 1,8% byabo basanzwe bari mu bahanga ba mbere mu ishuri.”
Abashakashatsi bamaze kwiga neza ndetse no gushyira ku ruhande ibyago biterwa n’umubyibuho ukabije, kunywa itabi ndetse no kugira ibinure byinshi mu mubiri, basanze ko umunyu muke (utumvikana/udakoze) mu biryo uteza ibibazo aho kubikemura.
Abashakashatsi bavuga ko hafi y’indwara zose zitangirira mu muyoboro w’ibitunga umubiri.
Abashakashatsi benshi baracyahakana ko iyo mva ifite ibyo byose bivugwa.
Abashakashatsi bo mu kigo cyamerika mu bijyanye n’ubumenyi bw’ikirere batangaza ko ngo mu 2023 kizatangira kujyanayo abantu niba hari ubuzima koko.
Abashigajwe inyuma n’amateka ni abatutsi.
Abashinyaguzi nibwo usanga bareba ngo umuntu afite amaboko n’amaguru nakore, kandi ibyo gutekereza ejo hazaza byararangiye.

Abashinzwe umutekano bakomeje kumfata na Danny baramufata umusore bari bari kumwe aba aranyereye acaho.
Abashinzwe umutekano wo mumuhanda nibakaze akazi kabo bizagera aho bigabanuke kuko biteza impanuka nyinshi.

Abatirishije mu mibatizo yombi abantu 539. Warebaga mu maso ya Nancy ukabonamo amarira y’ibyishimo.
Abato n’abakuru barawukeneye, Abanyafurika, Abanyaburayi, Abanyamerika ndetse n’abo muri Aziya barawukeneye, abakire ndetse n’abakene barawukeneye, abize n’abatarize barawukeneye.
Abatowe mu nzego z’ibanze kandi bavuze ko ikibazo cyo gutura mu manegeka no kubaka mu kajagari bitizwa imbaraga n’imitangire mibi ya Serivise mu bayobozi bashinzwe gutanga ibyangombwa byo kubaka.
Abatoza b’Amavubi basobanuye kenshi ko Bayisenge atazakoreshwa muri iyi mikino kuko akina hanze y’u Rwanda.
Abatoza be, abo bakinana, umushakira ikipe, abashakisha impano n’abasesenguzi, Ntilikina ngo arakuze mu mutwe kandi umubiri we urakwiriye.
Abatukana bo nibwira ko bafite aho babyigira.
Abatumiwe bose bazakirirwa mu Ituze Garden ku Kimironko ( 16:00 Pm ) iruhande rwa Four Square Gospel Church.
Abatunganya ubwiza nabo baramenyekanye cyane Bamwe mu bihebeye umwuga wo gusiga ndetse no guha abantu ubwiza nabo baramenyekanye cyane kugeza ubwo batwara n’ibihembo bitandunye ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Abaturage babonye iby’iyo nkongi, bahuriza ku kuvuga ko yabaye ‘mu buryo butunguranye’ ku buryo ngo batazi icyayiteye.
Abaturage babonye umurambo w’uyu mugabo mu ijoro ryakeye, bavuga ko uyu wari umucumbitsi muri akagace ashobora kuba yishwe n’abanyerondo bagahita baburirwa irengero.
Abaturage bacu bategereje ko tubajyana mu cyerekezo gihamye.”
Abaturage bacyo ni ubwoko bw’Abamestizos bagera kuri 98%, na ba kavukire bagera kuri 7% (ari bo Abamisikitos, Abapech, Abajikakis, ndetse n’Abarenkas) n’abirabura bagera kuri 2% ; ndetse n’abera bagera kuri 1%.
Abaturage ba Gahara na bo bemeza ko ibikorwa by’aba bana byabereye urugero abandi, baba abakuru n’abato, bikaba byaranahinduye imitekerereze ya benshi mu baturage ba Gahara.
Abaturage bagana iki kigo bemeza ko nk’iyo umubyeyi agiye kwa muganga bikaba ngombwa ko yoherezwa ku bitaro bikuru ngo hifashishwa ingobyi kuko nta bundi buryo bwo kumugezayo buhari.
Abaturage bagire umuco wo kuhira turwanye inzara iterwa n’iri hindagurika ryibihe turimo guhura naryo.
Abaturage bagize amahirwe babona ubigira imishinga none ngo ni Ikibazo?
Abaturage b’aha k’Umukamba bumvise vuba Politiki ya Leta yo gutura ku midugudu kuko hashize imyaka icumi ingo nyinshi zivuye mu bikombe n’ahandi bari batuye mu buryo butagaranye cyane kandi butanoze, bikagorana kubagezaho ibikorwa remezo.
Abaturage ba hano babwiye Umuseke ko Habanabakize n’umugore we basanzwe ari abantu batunzwe no guhingira abandi, bubatse iyi nzu mu gihe kirekire kubera amikoro macye.
Abaturage ba hano bataragerwaho n’amashanyarazi basaba Perezida uzatorwa kubasabira REG ko yajya ikorana n’amashyirahamwe yabo mu kuyabegereza.
Abaturage ba hano bavugaga ko bibabaje kubona umuntu yubaka inzu abayobozi bareba bakaza kuyisenya yuzuye yanayitashyemo kandi banazi ko uyu basenyeye nta rindi cumbi afite.
Abaturage bahise baririmba cyane ngo “Wahisemo neza… Nyagasani muri kumwe.”
Abaturage bahise bavuga ngo mwari murenganyije umuntu w’Imana barandeka…. nari mpasize ubuzima”.
Abaturage bakaba bishimira uburyo ingabo z’u Rwanda zahanganye na bo zikabatsimbura amahoro n’umutekano bikagaruka.
Abaturage ba Karongi nubwo bishimira ko bubakiwe ibitaro ariko ahu byubatswe hasimbuye stade Gatwaro ndetse kuva ubwo ntibongera kugira ikipe y’umupira w’amaguru.
Abaturage bakwibwiriye ko niba nta n’agapira ko kwambara ubazanira nta mpamvu yo kwirirwa ku zuba bagutegereje!
Abaturage bakwiye kubaha abashinzwe umutekano.
Abaturage bamaze kubona iyo nkongi, bavuga ko bihutiye gutabaza polisi ishami rishinzwe kuzimya inkongi gusa ngo polisi yahageze hamaze kwangirika byinshi.
Abaturage bamaze kugaragariza ubuyobozi bwâ€™Akarere ka Nyarugenge ikibazo cyâ€™iyi ruhurura, hahise haterana inama na bamwe mu baturage kugira bige ibyâ€™iki kibazo.
Abaturage bamugabiye bavuga ko bifuza kunganira Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame watangije gahunda ya ‘Girinka Munyarwanda’.
Abaturage bamwe bahingaga iki gishanga ngo ntibakwiye kugira impungenge kuko nibeza imboga batazabura ibishyimbo cyangwa ibigori bahahingaga kuko bazaba bafite amafaranga yo kubigura bavanye mu mboga ngo zitajya zibura isoko.
Abaturage bamwe kandi bashigikiye ibyo uyu mugabo akora kuko ngo ibisambo byabajujubije kandi ngo icyiza ni uko ntawe yica ahubwo abagaragaza gusa.
Abaturage bamweretse ko bemeranya na we bamanika amadarapo.
Abaturage bansabiye gushyirwa ku rutonde rw’abasaza bagomba gufashwa, umuyobozi w’umudugudu yanga kunshyiraho birambabaza.”
Abaturage banyuranye bigaragambije batambamira icyamunara ku manywa yo ku tariki 27 Mutarama 2017, iyi myigaragambyo yanakomerekeyemo abantu babiri barimo n’umupolisi.
Abaturage banyuranye twavuganye, batubwiye ko babona nta bwoba buhari.
Abaturage baramubonye baramufata bahamagara police imuta muri yombi aho ategereje gushyikirizwa inkiko.
Abaturage bari aho baje kureba ibyabaye bakaba babwiye Radio/TV1 ko ibi biterwa no kuba abasore baba bashaka kwiyemera ku bakobwa gusa bagira inama abakobwa kujya bitondera abasore babasohokana kuko hari igihe nabo bazajya bafungirwa mu tubari.
Abaturage bari baje gusaba izi servisi babwiye Umuseke ko ari ikintu kiza cyane kuba bari kuzihabwa ku buntu kandi vuba.
Abaturage bari batuye muri Nyakatsi bafashijwe gutura heza, gahunda ya VUP yashyizwe mu bikorwa mu mirenge yose 416, aho mu mwaka wa 2010 yari mu mirenge 60. Ingengo y’imari yo gufasha abatishoboye yikubye inshuro zirenze ebyiri.
Abaturage bari bitabiriye ku bwinshi, by’umwihariko nk’i Nyamagabe, bamwe bageze ahabereye igikorwa mbere ya saa kumi z’ijoro kandi barategereza kugera saa yine ubwo Paul Kagame yageraga kuri Stade i Nyagisenyi.
Abaturage barimo abakozi ba Leta, abigenga n’ibigo by’amashuri byo mu Karere ka Muhanga bavuga ko kwibohora nyakuri ari ukugaragaza ibyo bamaze kugeraho muri iyi myaka 23 ishize, urugamba rusigaye ari rwo guhangana n’ubukene.
Abaturage ba Rubavu batunguwe n’Inkoni y’Umwamikazi w’u Bwongereza, abenshi ntibazi akamaro kayo Inkoni y’Umwamikazi w’u Bwongereza yazengurukijwe mu mujyi wa Rubavu, ariko abaturage benshi batunguwe no kuyibona bavuga ko batazi ibyayo.
Abaturage bashimiye aba bayobozi baje kubafata mu mugongo, mu byago bagize, bavuga ko bazakomeza kwicungira umutekano no gushimangira imiyoborere myiza.
Abaturage batangarije Ijwi ryâ€™Amerika, ko abaturanyi babo bagifite agatege basuhutse bakajya gushaka icyabatunga mu mirenge yindi yejeje, abandi bakerekeza mu gihugu cya Uganda.
Abaturage bati “Ni wowe” Kagame wizeye insinzi, avuze ko muri manda y’imyaka irindwi iri imbere bisaba ubufatanye kugira ngo ibikorwa byagezweho birusheho kubera imvumba y’imibereho myiza y’abaturage.
Abaturage baturuka mu byaro bya kure hakaba hari abaza mu modoka mwateganyije abapolisi bo mu muhanda muri iyo mihanda y’igitaka?
Abaturage bavuga ko babone nta gishushanyombonera cy’Umugi wa Mukamira gihari, ngo niba kinahari ntikizwi, ababa bakizi nabo ngo ntibagisobanukiwe.
Abaturage bavuga ko bagihangayikishijwe no gucumbikirwa ndetse no kuba imyaka yabo yaragiye, basaba ubuyobozi kubarwanaho.
Abaturage bavuga ko batabona amafaranga yo gusora, ngo batekereje ku musoro bazasabwa kandi bamenyereye kujya gucuruza muri Uganda bahitamo kwirinda kujya mu isoko.
Abaturage bavuga ko Dusabe yaje muri ako gace afite abana bane, barimo abakobwa babiri: Victoire Ingabire Umuhoza na murumuna we Uwineza Régine bari bahuje se, n’abandi bana babiri Gaby na Abdul bavukaga ku wundi mugabo.
Abaturage bavuga ko ECOBANK yakoreraga hano yafunze kubera inyungu nyinshi baca abifuza inguzanyo, gusa ngo siyo gusa n’izindi inguzanyo iri hejuru.
Abaturage bavuga ko igitera imirire mibi mungo zabo ari ukurya ikiriribwa kimwe cy’ibirayi gusa n’uburangare bw’ababyeyi bamwe na bamwe.
Abaturage bavuga ko uburwayi bw’imyumbati bateye ubushije ngo bwarabakenesheje cyane kuko barumbije.
Abaturage bavuga ko uyu ari ubwa kabiri bamwifatiye muri iki cyumweru bakamushyikiriza Police ariko agahita arekurwa.

Abaturage bazakangurirwa kuzigama, gutegura udushinga duto, maze ibi bizatume bivana koko mu bukene.
Abaturage bazamenya ryari ko amategeko abarengera?
Abaturage benshi baje kumva ibya Mpayimana mu mujyi wa Byumba Mpayimana avuga ko byatuma abayobozi kuri izi nzego z’ibanze bajya bakorana umurava ibyo bashinzwe kuko bazirikana ko ibyo bakoze babibazwa n’abaturage.
Abaturage benshi batagezweho bagasaba ko ubutaha habayeho igikorwa nk’iki cyajya gitegurwa mu buryo bwagutse, ku buryo abaganga bashyirwa nko ku rwego rw’umudugudu aho begera abaturage.
Abaturage bibumbiye mu miryango 104 igizwe n’abantu 451, bashima cyane aho bimuriwe, ndetse bakavuga ko badashobora kubugereranya n’ubwo babagaho bagikikijwe n’amazi, ariko ngo inzara irabarembeje.
Abaturage bigishijwe ku buzima bwo mu kanwa n’amenyo Aba ni abari baje kwivuza amenyo banahawe ubumenyi kuri yo Akira amakuru yacu muri Email yawe Your email address will not be published.
Abaturage b’imidugudu ya Rwarucurucura na Mbale bandikiye Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyagatare bamusaba ubufasha muri iki kibazo, aho bavuga ko irimbi ryabo ryagurishijwe.

Abaturage bitabiriye igikorwa cye biganjemo abacuruza ku isoko ry’abagore riri hafi aha bamubaza ibibazo nawe akabasubiza.

Abaturage bo bavuga ko amakorera ibitangaza kandi ko ibitangaza byose babone babikesha we.

Abaturage na bo batatse ‘ibihombo bikomeye’ kuko ubuhahirane ahanini bushingiye ku igurishwa ry’ibikomoka ku buhinzi n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro bwagoranaga.
Abaturage nabo biteguye abiyamaza ku mbuga nkoranyambaga Uko ikoranabuhanga ryateye imbere mu Rwanda, n’abaturage biteguye uko kwiyamaza kw’abakandida hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, bakanabona ari uburyo bwiza.
Abaturage ni benshi baje kumwakira.

Abayoboke ba ADEPR bitabiriye uwo muhango (Ifoto Ndayishimye JC) Minisitiri w’Intebe ntabwo yeruye ngo akomoze kuri ayo makimbirane ariko yavuze ko kugira ngo iri torero rikomeze ritere imbere bakubahiriza inama Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yabagiriye.

Abayoboke b’amadini ariko bavuga ko ngo bitoroshye gukora neza mu gihe bari kumwe ku isoko n’abanyereza imisoro.
Abayoboke be bavuze ko mbere yuko atwika izi Bibiliya yabajnye kubabwira ko muri ‘King James Version’ no mu Isezerano rishya zakozweho ibimeze nko guhimbahimba ndetse hari imirongo imwe n’imwe yakuwemo nta bisobanuro bitanzwe.
Abayoboke b’iri shyaka bavuga ko batazihanganira abatobera abanyarwanda bagamije gusenya gahunda nziza ya Ndi Umunyarwanda, kandi ariwo musingi w’ubumwe n’ubwiye n’icyomoro ku banyarwanda.
Abayoboke b’ishyaka ‘PL’ n’umuyobozi waryo, Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga amategeko umutwe w’Abadepite Donaltile Mukabaliza baje gushyigikira Kagame nk’uko babyiyemeje.
Abayoboke b’Itorero rya Pantekote mu Rwanda (ADEPR), Paruwase ya Rushubi mu karere ka Musanze biyemeje kuba abafatanyabikorwa mu gukumira no kurwanya ibyaha birimo iyinjizwa ry’ibiyobyabwenge mu gihugu, icuruzwa, ndetse n’ikoreshwa ryabyo.
Abayoboraga ADEPR bavuga ko ibyo bakurikiranweho ari amatiku n’ibihimbamo Mu rubanza rw’ubujurire ku ifunga n’ifungura ry’agateganyo rw’abahoze ari abayobozi b’Itorero rya ADEPR, abaregwa bagaragaje ko ibyo ubushinjacyaha bubashinja ari amatiku n’ibihuha.

Akivuga ibi yahise anasobanura imbogamizi ubu bari guhura na zo bitewe n’uburangare bw’abaturage ati “Turarwana n’abaturage, ahaba icyaha baraza na bo bagahita bahafata, ugafata uwahuruye aho gufata umunyacyaha kuko intoki za nyuma zaje ari uz’uwahuruye.”
Ako kabazo ko kugabanya ubugari bw’umuhanda uzenguruka Amahoro Stadium hagashyirwa design nkiyi mbere ya Serena-Mariott, na njye nigeze kukibazaho!
Ako kana karaza kunsura bisanzwe ntacyo nakabaza ndabizi karanakanira bya hatali nta kintu kakwihera!”
Ako kanya Aangela yahise ajya imbere nanjye ndamukurikira dukata mu gikari tugeze ku irembo mba mbonye ni wa chauffeur wo kwa Sacha, Njyewe-“Nonese ko watinye kuza bite?”
Ako kanya abanyagikari baraje maze maze baratwakira, Nelson na Brendah batwereka uko bazajya babigenza baduha n’uburenganzira bwo kunywa agacupa bari batuguriye kuri uwo munsi wabo utazagaruka.
Ako kanya amaso yanjye yatangiye kumwitegereza no kumwitaho birenze uko namubonaga mbere.
Ako kanya Bob yahise arambura urushyi no ku itama rya Sacha ngo pyaa!
Ako kanya Bruno yahise akura telephone mu mufuka akuramo password vuba vuba ari nako yivugishaga ngo, Bruno-“Nta soni, ubwo se urakeka ko naba narayasibye?
Ako kanya Gasongo yahise yigira hino gato atangira kuvuga anyongorera buhoro birantungura.
Ako kanya haje abasore batatu ubona ko bamenyereye centre maze Mapiki atangira kubabaza inzu umwe muri bo ahita yitanguranwa, We- “Boss!
Ako kanya hari indi modoka yaje ipakiye ibintu iparika aho, hashize akanya mbona wa mugabo ayihagaze iruhande nihuta musanga mukoraho arahindukira.
Ako kanya Jojo yahise abatura ibiceri byari biri hejuru ku kameza, akurura Brendah ngo bagende ageze imbere anjugunyira ijana, ubanza yari atwaye magana atanu, berekeza hepfo kuri restaurant yo kwa Brendah.
Ako kanya Kiki na Fiance we bahingutse aho Kiki afite champagne undi nawe afite uturahuri maze Papa Nelson ahita avuga, Papa Nelson-“Nelson mwana wanjye!
Ako kanya Madame Martin yahise agaruka ari kumwe na Martin wa nyawe, wawundi nabwiwe na Nelson, koko yari yarahindutse undi, wa mubyibuho bavugaga wararigiye cyera, nta musatsi, mbega yari ateye impuhwe ku muntu umuntu wamumenye mu mateka.
Ako kanya Mapiki yagize ubwoba bwinshi maze mbona yigiye inyuma, ndetse mbona aratitiye.
Ako kanya Moto yahise ihaguruka vuba ifata umuhanda zamu nawe atangira gukubita umutwe hasi yigaragura cyane ngo kamubayeho.
Ako kanya mpita mbibona ko ari amarozi, atari yo namwohereza kwa muganga nabwo mba nabibonye.”
Ako kanya nagiye kubona mbona igihiriri cy’abantu kinyuzeho ari nako bagenda basakuza ngo muramufate muramufate, nanjye mba mvuye mu modoka mu kureba neza mbona ni umugabo wambaye ibintu bisa nabi, mu kwitegereza neza mbona ni Gasongo.
Ako kanya nagiye kumva numva intoki zoroshye mu gituza cyanjye mpita njya mu kinya nongeye kuvayo numvise inseko ya Joy.
Ako kanya nahise mfata umuhanda niruka nsanga moto Joy yari agiyeho ngize amahirwe hari indi moto yahise inyuraho nyihagarika vuba, nta kindi navugaga usibye kumubwira gukurikira moto yari agiyeho.
Ako kanya nahise mpaguruka maze nkingura urugi rwo muri salon ndasohoka ngana ku muryango w’igipangu, ngifungura urugi nakubiswe n’inkuba itagira amazi nsanze koko ari Joy.
Ako kanya nahise nihanagura amarira mbwira Dorlene ko yampamagaye igihe twari turi muri Pub nkanga kumwitaba maze arikanga.
Ako kanya nahise nikubura ndataha, nageze kwa Nelson nsanga Fil sari gukinisha Gasongo nk’ibisanzwe, nanjye ndicara nkomeza kubareba hashize akanya numva ihoni riravuze Fils ajya gukingura.
Ako kanya nahise nshyira telephone mu mufuka maze ntoragura udukwi, ntibyatinze iminota mirongo itatu nari mbonye inkwi nyinshi, ndamanuka ngaruka mu rugo nsanga Jojo yicaye hanze yipfutse igitenge mu mutwe yubitse umutwe mu maguru.

Akon ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye batumiwe ngo baganirize urubyiruko rusaga 2800 ruteraniye mu Rwanda mu nama ya YouthConnect Africa, yiga ku buryo amahirwe urubyiruko rw’uyu mugabane rufite yabyazwa ikintu gikomeye.
Akon yabwiye urubyiruko ko Africa niba ishaka gukomera, igomba kubaka isura yayo no kumenyekanisha ibyiza byayo, gukomera, amateka n’umuco wa Africa kuko iri ngo ari ibanga ibihugu nka America bikoresha kugira ngo bikomeze kuba ibihangange.
Akon yaherukaga kuza mu Rwanda ku itariki 28 Nyakanga 2015, yari aje gutangira ibiganiro n’abayobozi batandukanye b’u Rwanda ku mushinga w’amashanyarazi ugamije gukwirakwiza amashanyarazi mu bice by’icyaro bikeneye kuvanwa mu bwigunge.
Akon yavuze ko u Rwanda ibintu byinshi byahindutse cyane nk’uko yabibonye akigera ku kibuga cy’indege, agereranyije n’uko byari bimeze mungendo enye aheruka kuhakorera.

Attention; nibyo koko ni ibinyoma nka bimwe byo muri mythology y’abagiriki.
Atuheire Junior Uziko aho buzakera tuzaba nko muri Koreya ya Ruguru?
Atunzwe no guca inshuro, ubwo twamusuraga mu 2015 umwana we mukuru yari afite imyaka umunani, ubu afite imyaka 10. Ubu twasanze we yagiye kwikoerra amatafari kugira ngo abone udufaranga azana mu rugo agafatanya na nyina gutunga barumuna be.

Bamwe mubavuzigakondo baravuga ko bahangayikishijwe n’umutungo wabo batazi aho uherereye mu gihe cyose bamaze bayoborwa na Dr Emmanuel Rekeraho na Gafaranga ngo kuko batazi aho asaga 1.500.000.000 yaburiwe irengero mu gihe cyose bamaze bayobora.
Bamwe mu bayoboke ba PL mu gikorwa cyo kwamamaza Paul Kagame mu Ruhango (Ifoto/Perezidansi) Yavuze ko adashidikanya ko azegukana intsinzi, avuga ko nubwo Green Party ivuga ko iharanira kurengera ibidukikije, RPF ibirengera kurusha Green Party.
Bamwe mu bayobozi bayo batangaje ko iyo banki ifite gahunda gutangira ibikorwa byayo mu Rwanda mu mezi atandatu abanza y’umwaka utaha.
Bamwe mu bayobozi baza minisiteri bavuga ko bishoboka ko yaba ntamakuru afite ahagije kukongo ibikorwa bakora byose baba babiteguye kandi ngo ntabikorwa bakora batabanje kubyumvikanaho ngo nibasanga bitari mu igenamigambi ryabo babyihorere.
Bamwe mu bayobozi bitabiriye ibi biganiro twaganiriye batubwiye ko ibyo basabwe n’umuyobozi w’Intara bagiye kubishyira mu bikorwa vuba na bwangu.
Bamwe mu bayobozi bo kuri uyu mugabane kandi baravugwaho kwita ku nyungu z’Abanyaburayi, naho inyungu z’umuturage zigaterwa umugongo.
Bamwe mu bayobozi bo mu Rwego rw’Umuvunyi mu kiganiro bahaye abanyamakuru mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu Your email address will not be published.
Bamwe mu bazi iby’imihanda bavuga ko uyu watashywe uyu munsi uburamo Dos d’âne kugira ngo hatazagira abawukoresha bakirara bigatuma habaho impanuka nyinshi zigahitana ubuzima bw’abawukoresha.
Bamwe mu bazi neza uyu Mukirisitu Richard, banavuga ko imbaraga akoresha zishobora kuba zituruka kuri se umubyara witwa Bishop Kayitare Jean Baptiste kuko nawe ari umunyabitangaza, ndetse Mukirisitu nawe avuga ko ariwe wabimukundishije.
Bamwe mu bazunguzayi bavuze n’umubabaro mwinshi bavuze ko batabona neza iterambere ry’igihugu mugihe bamaze igihe ntakibageraho ahubwo basiraginzwa muri gereza abana babo bakirukanwa mumashuri abandi bakaba zamayibobo.
Bamwe mu bifuza kuba abakandida mu matora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu, bakunze kwinubira ko igihe cyo kwiyamamaza cyagenwe ari gito ariko Perezida Kagame yagize ati “Igihe ntabwo nibwira ko ari gito.”
Bamwe mu bikorera bato n’abaciriritse bakunze kunenga ko iki kigega kitabageraho, ko ahubwo usanga gifasha abikorera bo mu rwego rwo hejuru.
Bamwe mu bitabiriye iki gitaramo batunguwe n’ibyabaye nk’uko bagiye babyivugira cyane cyane iyo babaga bagiye gutanga inkunga yo gushyigikira umurimo w’Imana uri muri All in One group.
Bamwe mubo mu muryango wa Vianney Nsengimana, ntibemeranya n’ubuyobozi kubyo buvuga ko yaba atarishwe kuko ngo biboneye ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko yishwe kandi akaba yari asanzwe afitanye amakimbirane n’abaturanyi be bapfa imitungo irimo amasambu.
Bamwe mu bo mu muryango we babaga mu Rwanda bari bagaragarije uru rukiko ko nta mpamvu ikwiye gutuma umuntu wabo ashyingurwa mu mahanga bityo akwiye gutahurwa agashyingurwa kuko ngo ikifuzo cye cyari uko umunsi umwe azataha mu Rwanda.
Bamwe mu bo mu muryango we ngo barifuza ko yatabarizwa (yashyingurwa) mu Rwanda naho ababanaga na we muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bifuza ko yatabarizwayo.
Bamwe mu Bufaransa baracyategereje umuStar w’umufaransa muri NBA nka Tony Parker wo muri San Antonio Spurs, hari Abafaransa batangiye kuvuga ko Ntilikina ariwe ushobora kugera ku rwego rwe.
Bamwe mu bunganizi muri uru rubanza bagaragaje ko nubwo byaba byiza impapuro zitabajwe, ngo binakeye amafaranga menshi, bagaragaza ko nibura hakenerwa nk’amapaki (lames) y’impapuro agera ku 1000 bityo ngo bikaba bihenze.
Bamwe mu nshuti ze bavuga ko yaharaniye kumenyekana kuva cyera kandi ahanini mu bintu bibi.
Bamwe muri aba bagore basabiriza bahetse abana uba ubona nta kindi kibazo bafite ku mubiri.
Bamwe muri aba Banyarwanda badafite ibyangombwa ariko bavukanye ubwenegihugu babajije niba bazoroherezwa gutora, nuko Ambasaderi abasubiza ko ibyo bitazababuza uburenganzira bwabo, ko icya ngombwa basabwa ari icyemeza aho batuye ubu.
Bamwe muri aba bashyitsi u Rwanda rufite ni abakuru b’ibihugu barenga 35, aba Minisitiri b’Intebe, abayobozi b’ibigo bikomeye muri Afurika no ku Isi muri rusange n’abandi barenga ibihumbi bine….
Bamwe muri aba, byabarengaga bagasuka amarira kubera ikiniga.
Bamwe muri abo bakobwa byagaragaga ko bafite impano mu mikino ngororamubiri ku buryo bagombaga kuziba icyuho cya Mukamurenzi Marcianne wamamaye mu myaka ya za 1988 kuzamura.
Bamwe muri bo banyuraga mu Gatsata abandi i Ndera kuko batari kubona umuhanda bakwirwamo bose.
Bamwe muri bo bavuga ko byarushaho kubagirira akamaro abo bireba bagize icyo babikoraho hakiri kare kuko ngo birabahombya cyane.
Bamwe muri bo ntibarahabwa amakuru y’aho imibiri y’ababo yajugunywe ngo babashyingure mu cyubahiro.
Bamwe muri bo ubu ni ibirangirire… Ni umunyarwandakazi wavukiye mu karere ka Rubavu ahahoze hazwi nko muri Gisenyi akaza gukurira mu Bufaransa.
Bamwe muri izi mpunzi baganiriye na Radio Ijwi ry’Amerika bagize bati’’ntitwumva ukuntu reta yâ€™u Rwanda yifuza ko duhunguka arinayo yadusanze mu mashyamba yo muri Republika iharanira demokarasi ya Kongo kutwicirayo’’.
Bamwe muri rwo bagenda bashishikariza abataritabira gahunda y’amatora, kwiyandikisha no kwikosoza kuri lisiti z’itora.
Bamwe muri uru rubyiruko batwara abagenzi ku magare.
Bamwe mutukana mubeshya ngo mushyigikiye Kagame kandi ari bwa buryarya bwanyu n’inda nini yabananiye, umunsi yaba adahari wasanga mumuvuga nabi kandi mwaririrwaga mumubeshya ngo muramutukanira.

Banki Nkuru irimo irakora icyo nakwita ‘itegeko’ rirengera uburenganzira bw’abafata serivisi z’imari.”
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda iherutse gutangaza ko mu mezi 11 ya mbere mu 2016, ikinyuranyo cy’ibyoherezwa mu mahanga n’ibitumizwayo cyagabanutseho 5.1%, kuva kuri miliyoni 1,602.21 z’amadolari ya Amerika kugera kuri miliyoni 1.519.97 z’amadolari ya Amerika.
Banki y’Abaturage izwi nka BPR yatangiye gukorera mu Rwanda mu 1975 itangiranye n’abaturage ba Nkamba mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda, ikora nka Koperative “Union des Banques Populaire-UBPR”.
Banki ya Kigali (BK) nayo iri kwinjira muri Serivise z’ubwishingizi nayo ngo yashakaga kugura 35% by’imigabane ya Sonarwa, byari kuyigira umunyamigabane mukuru ariko ntibyakunda itsindwa na RSSB.
Banki y’Isi ikavuga ko muri uyu mwaka wa 2017 ubukungu bwa Africa yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara n’u Rwanda rubarizwamo buzazamukaho 2.6%, naho mu mwaka utaha wa 2018 buzamukeho 3.2, na 3.5% mu 2019.
Banki y’Isi irateganya ko muri uyu mwaka wa 2017 ubukungu bw’u Rwanda buzazamukaho 6.0% ari nacyo gipimo n’u Rwanda ruteganya.
Banki y’Isi iravuga ko ubukungu bw’ibihugu bya Africa bukomeje kugenda buhura n’ibibazo bimwe na bimwe birimo kugira ijambo rito ku isoko mpuzamahanga, ubukungu bw’isi budahagaze neza, n’ibibazo by’imbere mu bihugu.
Banki y’Isi itangaza ko icyizere cyo kubaho cyavuye ku myaka 28 mu 1994 kikagera ku myaka 66 mu mpera za 2015.
Banki yo muri Maroc irifuza imigabane muri Banki ya Kigali Banque Centrale Populaire yo muri Maroc iri mu biganiro na Banki ya Kigali ngo nibishoboka yegukane imigabane muri iyi banki ikomeye mu Rwanda.

Bavuga ko igikwiye kwitabwaho ari ubushobozi bagaragaza mu ngiro cyane ko hari abafite uburambe mu kazi kandi batarigeze bagaragaza imikorere mibi.

Bavuga ko iki gihingwa cyari gisanzwe kibafatiye runini kuko bamwe muri bo ari cyo bakeshaga kubona bimwe mu byangombwa byo mu rugo nk’umunyu, isabune n’utundi dukoresho.
Bavuga ko imyenda ikorerwa mu Rwanda niyiyongera bizatuma igiciro cyayo kigabanuka ku buryo n’abifuza gushora imari mu bucuruzi bwayo bafite amikoro aciriritse nkabo bazisanga muri ubu bucuruzi kandi bigatuma abakiliya baboneka ari benshi.
Bavuga ko iyi nzu ngo ikunze no gusakamburwa n’umuyaga yayubakiwe ubwo yari amaze kunaniranwa na nyina yabyutsaga nijoro atashye ngo amukingurire, bityo nyina na we ngo kandi ufite ubumuga amufasha kubaka ako kazu.
Bavuga ko iyo umuntu afite ikibazo, cyangwa se ikitagenze neza muri serivisi yahawe yahamagara kuri nomero yatanzwe.
Bavuga ko kuri bamwe muri bo kuvuga zimwe mu ngingo z’amategeko zo kurengera umugore byari nko guca umugani ku manywa cyangwa kwikirigita ugaseka.
Bavuga ko kuvura abarwayi ari byo bahugiragamo ntibite ku bindi bikorwa bizamura imibereho isanzwe y’abaturage, bityo ngo kuvura no gufasha ni ibikorwa bibiri bagiye gukomeza gufatanya uhereye uyu munsi.
Bavuga ko kuzinywa bizeye ko muri icyo gihe bazifatanyije n’amasengesho basenze aribwo bakira roho zabo n’imibiri.
Bavuga ko mu bikorwa byo gukusanya aya mafaranga babonye 2 500 000 Frw, bagahita bumva ko azafasha aba banyarwanda bashobora kurembera mu ngo kubera kubura umusanzu wa mutuelle de santé.
Bavuga ko mu gihe cyo hambere umugore yari uwo mu rugo adashobora kugira umurimo yikorera ngo umuteze imbere ndetse batagira ijambo ariko ko ubu nta murimo bahejweho.

Bavuga ko mu mwaka wa 2014 ubuyobozi bwababujije kuvugurura amazu yabo banabuzwa kubaka inzu nshya, ubuyobozi bubarura imitungo ngo bubishyure.
Bavuga ko n’ibyo batumiza mu mahanga bibageraho biri ku giciro gihanitse kubera amafaranga y’urugendo n’imisoro ikiri hejuru.
Bavuga ko nyuma y’imyaka irenga 20 bishimiye cyane gusangira n’abavandimwe babo umwaka mushya, ndetse ngo bakanawurya bafite umutekano usesuye kuko aho babaga bahoraga bahunga bagahorana umutima uhangayitse.
Bavuga ko nyuma yo gukurwa ku rutonde rw’abagombaga gufashwa binyuze mu nkunga y’ingoboka ubuzima bwahise buba bubi.
Bavuga ko nyuma yo kubona amateka yaho biyemeje kongera imbaraga mu gutanga uburere bwiza ku bana babo no kubarinda amacakubiri ari na ko barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside.

Bibiliya, Ijambo ry’Imana, ivuga ko Imana yaduhaye Ijambo Ryayo, kugira ngo tubone ibikoresho bidufasha gukora imirimo myiza (2 Timoteyo 3:16-17).
Bibiliya inyereka ko bidakwiye, kuboha imisatsi, ntaho mbona ivuga ku defriza.
Bibiliya itanga ubwisanzure kuri iki kibazo.
Bibiliya itubwira ko tugomba kwitegura urubanza nyuma y’urupfu rwacu (Abaheburayo 9:27), ntabwo rero iduha amahirwe ya kabiri.
Bibiliya ivuga ko Herodi yamutinyaga nyamara agakunda kumwumva usoreze kuri Pawulo wari ufite inshuti nyinshi mu bayobozi b'icyo gihe, akavuga ko ubutegetsi bukwiye kubahwa kuko bushyirwaho n'Imana.
Bibiliya ivuga ko icyamuteraga kuvuga atyo ni ukwereka urupfu azubaha Imana.
Bibiliya ivuga ko igihe umuntu aguye mu cyaha aba agomba kwicisha bugufi agasaba Imana imbabazi, kwiha amahoro no kwiyumvisha ko nta cyaha wakoze ntibigukuraho kuba wagikoze.
Bibiliya ivuga ko mu bibaho byose dukwiye guhora dushima ngo kuko aricyo Idushakaho muri Kristo.
Bibiliya ivuga ko Salomon yategetse ubwami bwunze ubumwe bwa Israel hagati ya 970 na 931 mbere y’igihe cyacu.
Bibiliya ivuga ko ugomba kubahira mwene so nk’urimo Kirisitu.
Bibiliya ivuga ko Uyu wigaragaza nkâ€™Imana mu rusengero akiyerekana nkâ€™Imana ni ubupapa bwihaye umwanya wa Yesu Kristo nkâ€™uko isomo ryo 2abatesalonike 2:1-10 habivuga tugomba kugaragaza uwo munyabugome mbere yâ€™uko Yesu agaruka”.
Bibiliya ku bayemera ivuga ko vino ari umukobanyi.
Bibiliya mu mirongo ikurikiyeho Imana iti :“ Kandi nimwiyiriza ubusa ntimukabe nk’indyarya zigaragaza umubabaro, kuko bagaragaza umubabaro kugira ngo abantu babarebe ko biyirije ubusa.
Bibiliya ni igikoresho Umwuka akoresha mu buzima (Abefeso 6:17), ni igice cya cy’ingirakamaro kandi cy’ingenzi mu ntwaro Imana iduha zo kurwana intambara z’umwuka (Abefeso 6:12-18).
Bibiliya ntivuga imyaka Kayini yari afite ubwo yicaga Abeli (Itangiriro 4:8).
Bibiliya yuzuyemo ibinyoma, ku buryo bitoroshye kumenya ukuri guke kurimo.

Birarababaje kubona hali ibigo by’amashuli cyane cyane abanza bidafite ibibuga byo gukiniraho.
Birasa ariko sikimwe abantu bavuga ubutumwa ariko ntabwo bavuga bimwe.
Birasa Jacques ushinzwe iperereza mu Rwego rw’Umuvunyi avuga ko atatawe muri yombi kuko “yadufashije kumenya ikibazo, adufasha no kumenya abandi” batuburiwe na Nduwimana.
Birashoboka ariko bizaterwa n’uko abazaza gukora isuzuma bazabibona, icyo na cyo kirashoboka, yego hari ibyakozwe bigaragara ariko nk’akarere twakabaye twararushijeho, ariko abakora isuzuma buriya na bo bafite uko bazabibona.
Birashoboka ariko ko wagira akazi katakwemerera kuba wabona akanya ka buri munsi, aha ushyiraho gahunda y’icyumweru cyangwa ukwezi.
Birashoboka ariko na none ko abikubwira mu rwego rwo kukumvisha ko urukundo yifuza kugukunda ari urusanzwe rwa kivandimwe, ko akubonamo umusore mwiza ariko na none udakwiye kugera ku rugero rwo kumubera umukunzi.
Birashoboka cyane, gusenga ni ikintu cy’ingenzi ukora mu gitondo, na nijoro ariko reba igihe mu munsi ugenemo umwanya ujye uwuharira isengesho.
Birashoboka ko byagutangaza kumva ko hari ibibi byabaye muri TMI.
Birashoboka ko haba hari indwara urwaye ; nabyo ni ngombwa ko ubimubwira akabimenya.
Birashoboka ko nta wundi mukinnyi Police FC yari isanganywe uzongererwa amasezerano kuko nibagura abandi batanu bazuzura 12 basozaga amasezerano.
Biratangaje cyane kubona umwiza nkawe wabuze ibyishimo, ntabwo ari uko utabikwiye ahubwo n’uko benshi bumva ko batabikwiye, ariko uwamenye agaciro k’umutima utanga utitangiriye itama yamenye neza ko ubitse ibyishimo byinshi bitaguranwa isura n’amagana.”
Biratangaje kandi ibi byose ni ukuri.
Biratangaje kubona abayobozi b’itorero kuri union baraje bagasanga korari iri kuririmba bakayicecekesha bakayibwira kujya kwicara n’indirimbo barimo baririmba idasoje maze ibyuma n’amajwi byose bigacecekeshwa abantu bakibaza ibibaye bikabayobera.

Biterwa n’icyizere cy’umutekano, cyangwa ni ubwoba?
Biterwa n’impamvu zinyuranye nk’umunaniro, kunywa inzoga nyinshi n’ibindi, ariko bikiyongera cyane iyo umubiri nta mazi ahagije ufite.
Bitewe ahanini n’imirimo itandukanye abo bahanzi bakora hanze y’umuziki.
Bitewe nâ€™uko nari narize ibijyanye nâ€™ubuganga nkandi mbikunda cyane, naje no kwinjira no mu bijyanye nâ€™ubuvuzi gakondo, ndabyiga, nitabira amahungurwa atandukanye birangira ntangije ikigo cyitwa “Genesis Health”.
Bitewe n’ikigero umuntu arimo, ngo vitamine B1 ikenewe ku kigero cy’uko nibura umuntu wese aba agomba gufata ibiribwa nibura bikungahaye kuri yo ku kigero cya 0,4 mg.

BRD ikaba izabigeraho bitewe n’amasezerano y’ubufatanye yasinyanye n’abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye barimo Fonds de SolidariteAfricain (FSA), African Guarantee Fund (AGF), BDF n’abandi.
BRD imwe muri banki zitanga inguzanyo z’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi nyinshi mu gihugu, kuri uyu wa Gatanu yasinyanye amasezerano na USAID binyuze mu mushinga wo guteza imbere ishoramari ry’abikorera mu mishinga y’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi bubyara inyungu (PSDAG).
BRD itangaza ko hagati ya 2015 na 2016 muri rusange mu bijyanye no kohereza ibicuruzwa mu mahanga hatanzwe miliyari esheshatu z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
BRD izafatanya n’andi mabanki, ibigo by’imari n’amakoperative gutanga inguzanyo z’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi ku giciro gitoya, ndetse n’abahinzi bato babone iziciriritse zitabagoye.
BRD kandi yatanze miliyari 4.1 Frw mu mishinga yo guteza imbere ubwikorezi bw’amakoperative n’abantu ku giti cyabo.

Guhera muri 1970 kugeza muri 2012 amako y’inyamaswa angana na 58% yamaze gucika.
Guhera muri 2009 muri Tanzania hari inzovu 44 806 ariko kugeza muri 2017 hari hasiganye izitarenze 15 217 ni ukuvuga ko hari hamaze kwica izigera kuri 66% ni imibare itangwa n’ikigo Tanzania Wildlife Research Institute.

Gukira bisaba gutera intambwe yo gutunganya icyo umutima ugushinja; cyaba kidahari ari baringa ukakizibukira; kugirango usubirane amahoro yuzuye.

Gukira bizanwa no kugira uwo wegera ukamuganiriza ( ukamusangiza ) ikibazo wagize akagufasha.

Gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri mbere yo kujya ku kazi na byo ngo biri muri bimwe byafasha abantu bagira ikibazo cyo kwibagirwa, aho iyo myitozo ituma amaraso atembera neza mu mubiri hose.

Gukorana na bo twakoranye nk’abantu baba bishimiye gukorera Imana.”

Gukorera ku gihe ni ingenzi.
Gukoresha abana imirimo mibi bigira ingaruka ku muryango mugari, kuko umwana wabayeho mu mvune zimushengura asa n’aho ata ubumuntu.
Gukoresha igiti cyakorewe mu ruganda cyangwa sipure hari ubusobanuro bifite ugomba kumenya kugirango wirinde gukora ibintu utazi ubusobanuro bwabyo nkuko wikipedia ibitangaza.
Gukoresha ingufu zabo muri ubwo buhinzi bwo mu busitani na byo byabafashije gutakaza ibiro.
Gukoresha inzitiramubu n’imiti iterwa mu nzu yica imibu ni bwo buryo nyabwo bwo kwirinda iyo ndwara ikwirakwizwa n’umubu, ariko ibihugu bisaga 60 byamaze kugaragaza ko hari imibu myinshi itakicwa n’imiti ikoreshwa ubu.
Gukoresha make up cyane bibangamira benshi mu basore ku buryo batahitamo umukobwa uzikoresha ku bwinshi, kuburyo utamenya isura ye nyakuri.
Gukoresha nabi ubutaka, abantu ntibite ku kurwanya isuri, gukoresha amafumbire yangiza ubutaka, guhoza isuka mu murima abantu ntibareka ubutaka ngo burare, kuvangavanga ibihingwa…ibi byose bituma ubutaka butakaza imbaraga, ntibutange umusaruro bwitezweho.

Hashize ibyumweru bibiri Leta ya Congo Kinshasa ifashe iki cyemezo ariko abaturage bakoraga ubu bucuruzi bavuga ko kidakwiye kuko ngo ibyo Leta ya Congo ishingiraho ivuga ko inkoko zo mu Rwanda zirwaye atari ukuri.
Hashize igihe, imyitwarire ye yatangiye guhinduka, rimwe akajya afata imodoka akigendera atambwiye aho agiye, akaza kugaruka bwije.
Hashize iminsi, abana ba Mibambwe na Nyirahondi bavutse impanga barapfa.
Hashize iminsi bategeka ko imfubyi zose zijya muri orpherinat; byarambabaje ku buryo numvaga kujya kubayo ntabishaka, ariko kubera itegeko njyayo, bwari ubuzima bubi cyane.
Hashize iminsi itatu abasiga amarangi, abakora imbere y’amaduka n’abakora ibikorwa by’isuku bitandukanye barara bakora.
Hashize iminsi mike iri torero ryugarijwe nâ€™ibibazo aho abayoyozi bashwanye bamwe bakurwa mu myanya barimo ngo mu bubiligi bahise bansimga amatorero yabo ndetse abandi bikaba bivugwa ko nabo bari mu mibambi yo gushing ayabo.
Hashize iminsi mike urukiko rwisumbuye rutegetse ko bafungwa iminsi 30 y’agateganyo kugira ngo ubushinjacyaha bukomeze iperereza.
Hashize imyaka 23, uwo munsi mu Rwanda wibukwa ariko ntiwizihizwe ku mpamvu zumvikana.
Hashize imyaka nkâ€™ibiri umugore we yahise abona ibyangombwa amusangayo bagumayo.
Hashize nk’iminota mirongo itatu ntawe umbajije, ntangira kumva nshitse intege ndetse numva n’ibitotsi biraje ntangira guhondobera si nzi ukuntu numvise umuntu ankozeho nshigukira hejuru.
Hashize umwanya nk’uw’iminota 5 pilote yumva mu ndege haratuje cyane.
Hashize umwanya numva umuntu arasuhuje ngo nimumpe umwana uri hano, undi ati: “Ntawe nguha namwitoreye”.
Hashize umwanya utari muto tuganira, nta kundi nari gusiga umwiza w’ibwanacyamwe aho ngataha aho nitaga mu rugo, koko ni nako byagenze narahagurutse ndamuhobera ndamugumana, si uguseka Angela ajya hasi!

Humura erega byose ni ukumenya uko ibyitwaramo, uwakubwira benshi yahuje!
Humura erega ndi urwibutso rwa Data!
Humura Gaju ibi si ko bizahora.”
Humura icyo nzi cyo ineza n’ubumuntu bwawe buzahora bugutambutsa ahagukangaranya,,,Ibaze ko na Danny yabibye bikarangira ubonye ibyanyu utamwirutseho,,Sacha yagushinje phone birangira umurahiye aho twinikaga.
Humura iminsi ni micye ibi bikarangira, nziko Imana izi byose itazemera ko nzira ubusa kandi ntabwo izemera ko urukundo yaremye rurangirira mu gahinda” Joy-“Yuwiiii!
Humura mwana wanjye, n’iyo So yakwanga abandi bakakuvuma nzaba ndi kumwe nawe, So agire atya ati n’ubundi uriya mukobwa ntiyari akwiye kuvuka!”
Humura nanjye niganye iyawe kandi aho wanjyanye nari naniwe kuvayo iyo utaza kuhankura!”
Humura nawe uri mwiza ntacyo amaso yanjye yakunengaho!”
Humura ndabizi bibaho, agaciro ndagaha impamvu washatse numero yanjye kuruta uburyo wayibonyemo, nonese ukoresha WhatsApp basi ngo umpe ifoto yawe?”
Humura ndacyo bitwaye, ikibi ni ukunsiga muyindi mood yangora kwikuramo ubundi ukagenda” Njyewe-“Oooh!
Humura niba ari no kuhasigara turahasigarana aho kugira ngo usigare usaritswe n’agahinda” Joy- “Urakoze kundema agatima Daddy!
Humura ni wowe nambariye kandi amaso yawe ni njye akwiye kureba njyenyine, naho iby’abandangarira byo nushaka ukubite!”
Humura ni wowe naremewe, uzahora wishima igihe cyose nzaba nkiriho!”
Humura ntabwo agusiga dore avuye hano mu kanya tumaze gusangira!”
Humura ntabwo mbabaye si mu gituza se!
Humura ntabwo nashakaga kukubaza uwo mwavuganaga ahubwo nashagaka kumva ko nta nkuru mbi irimo!”
Humura ntacyo ukibaye kandi nzagufasha kuba Joy wifuza!
Humura nta na kimwe nzigera nibagirwa mubyo wambwiye, ahubwo se ko utambajije ikinzinduye nta matsiko ufite?”
Humura nzaba mpari ibihe byose, Joy!
Humura nzaza vuba, kandi nzaba nkuri hafi, ariko se noneho ubu ko nta na telephone mfite ngo nzajye nkuvugisha nzabigenza gute?”
Humura rwnose uri umwe mu bacu, niba ujya uganira na Nelson cyane azakubwira inkuru y’umuntu witwa Kiki, murasa, muteye kimwe kandi ubuzima arimo ubu abukesha kuba yaragaragiye umunezero wuwamufashe akamwizera nkuko nawe Nelson yakwiyegereje” Fils- “Eeeh!
Humura rwose niba ari biriya byakubayeho ejo byararangiye!”
Humura rwose ntabwo ndi hano ngo nsubize umutima wawe ubaswe n’agahinda kagaragara mu maso, Daddy!
Humura rwose, sacha ni uwawe kandi ubugwari ni ukuziza umuntu ikinyoma” Bob- “Ariko se urwana niki?
Humura rwose, wirekure urye uhage ni wowe turagenderaho nuhaga twe nibwo turatangira kurya!”
Humura turi kwa muganga!

Ibi bikaba bigaragaza ko nta kindi kintu kiba kibashishikaje uretse kubaho ubuzima nk’ubw’ibyo byamamare birirwa bamamaza.

Ibi bikaba bituma u Rwanda mu bihugu 3 muri Africa bikoresha internet.

Ibi bikaba byarinda impfu z’abagera kuri miliyoni 97 ku isi, barimo abana 50 bapfa bakiri mu nda cyangwa nyuma gato yo kuvuka, ndetse na miliyoni 20 bicwa n’indwara zitandura zirimo umutima na diabete.

Ibi bikaza nyuma yuko Maroc yari ifite uwo mwanya kuva 1960 n’umwami Hassa II baza kuvayo Kadhafi ahaje n’amafaranga.
Ibi bikoresho bivugururwa umunsi ku wundi haba mu bijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga bikozwemo cyangwa serivisi bishobora guha umuntu ubikoresha.
Ibi bikoresho fatizo birimo imashini, amatisi n’ibindi bikenerwa muri izi nzego.
Ibi bikorwa byatangiye mu masaha y’igitondo bisozwa saa cyenda n’igice z’amanywa.
Ibi bikorwa byibanze cyane ku guha abaturage ubuvuzi bunyuranye ku buntu, kubaka no gusana ibiraro, imihanda, amavuriro, gutanga amazi meza, gutunganya ibishanga n’imisozi ihingwaho n’ibindi.
Ibi bikorwa byose byunganira gahunda za Leta zo guteza imbere imibereho myiza y’Abanyarwanda nkuko imvahonshya ibitangaza.
Ibi bikorwa kimaze kugeraho ni ibyo kwishimirwa ukurikije aho amahano yakibayemo”.
Ibi bikorwa si umwihariko w’u Rwanda kuko bizanakorwa mu bindi bihugu byo mu Karere birimo Tanzania, Kenya na Uganda binyuze muri gahunda yiswe ’Medical Training and Fellowship’ yatangijwe na Banki y’Iterambere y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.
Ibi bikunda kugaragara akenshi iyo umubyeyi cyangwa uwo ari we wese ukunda abana abaha umwanya wo kubumva akabaganiriza, akabatembereza, byaba na ngombwa bakamarana igihe kinini kugira ngo barusheho kunezerwa.
Ibi bikunze kugaragarira mu bigo bigaho,imiryangoyabondetsen’ahobatuye.
Ibi bimufasha kumva niba hari ingeso udakunda yaba afite yamubuza kukugiraho umukunzi.
Ibi bimugira umuntu mwiza wo gukundana nawe.
Ibi binatuma umuntu yibaza niba umuntu usuzugura itegeko cyangwa utaryubahirije ataba asuzuguye inzego zarishyizeho, na cyane ko hari ihame rivuga ko ntawukwiye kwitwaza ko atazi itegeko.

Ibi bintu 8 ubifite byakwicira izina rikazima burundu–Urutonde Posted by: Theoneste Niyikiza July 11, 2017 in UTUNTU N'UTUNDI Leave a comment Kugira izina mu bantu bivuze kuba bakubona neza, bagutekereza neza, bitewe n’uko bakuzi ubitwaraho.
Ibi bintu batubwiye nibyo cyane!
Ibi bintu bikunze kugaragara, bagenzi banjye mugerageze kwikubita agashya.
Ibi bintu bitatu byâ€™ibanze bizagufasha bitume umuhungu/umukobwa yumva atabaho atagufite agahita yifuza kubana na we.
Ibi bintu bitatu by’ibanze bizagufasha bitume umuhungu/umukobwa yumva atabaho atagufite agahita yifuza kubana na we.
Ibi bintu iyo mbigezeho numva mbangamiwe.
Ibi bintu ntabwo bisobanutse sinzi icyaba kibyihishe inyuma, keretse niba ari njye udasobanukiwe neza.
Ibi bintu ntibibaho kandi kubirebera ni ugushyigira akarengane no guteshwa agaciro.

Ibintu bidasanzwe bisohoka mu gitsina cyangwa Ibintu bisohoka mu gitsina badasanzwe (discharge, écoulement): bwa mbere na mbere bishobora guterwa n’indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, cyane cyane iyitwa chlamydia.

Ibi yabitangaje ubwo yafunguraga ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 21 Kamena 2017 inama ngarukamwaka yiga ku kwizihiza imitangire ya serivisi zigenewe abaturage muri Afurika ibera i Kigali.
Ibi yabitangaje ubwo yaganiraga na Royal TV mu mwanya bagira w’umutumirwa mu makuru aho abakurikira iki gitangazamakuru bamubaza ibibazo.
Ibi yabitangaje ubwo yasomaga missa ya mu gitondo kuwa kane mu masengesho yihariye iwe na bamwe mu bayobozi b’idini i Roma.
Ibi yabitangarije mu biganiro bikunze guhuza Polisi n’itangazamakuru ryo mu gihugu byabaye kuri uyu wa 12 Nyakanga 2017 ku Cyicaro Gikuru cya Polisi y’Igihugu ku Kacyiru.
Ibi yabitangarije mu ijambo yagejeje ku bitabiriye inama mpuzamahanga ku ikoranabuhanga mu guhindura Afurika y’iminsi itatu yaberaga i Kigali ku nshuro ya kabiri yiswe ‘Transform Africa’.
Ibi yabitangarije mu nama yateguwe n’Umuryango Never again, yari igamije kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe kubahiriza uburenganzira bw’ikiremwa muntu uba ku wa 10 Ukuboza buri mwaka.
Ibi yabitangarije urubyiruko rusaga 700 rwasoje Itorero Urunana rw’Urungano ryaberaga i Gabiro, ryasojwe uyu munsi.
Ibi yabivugaga hatangizwa PanAfrican Movement mu murenge wa Kanombe abwira abantu banyuranye batumiwe barimo urubyiruko, abikorera, abanyamadini, abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze n’abandi bakora ibihuza abantu benshi.
Ibi yabivugiye mu muhango wo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 23 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi wabereye ku Rwibutso rwa Murambi ruherereye mu Karere ka Nyamagabe.
Ibi yabivugiye mu Murenge wa Rwabicuma mu Karere ka Nyanza, akubutse mu Karere ka Ruhango, ku munsi wa mbere wo kwiyamamariza kuyobora u Rwanda mu matora yegereje.

IJAMBO RY’IMANA NA IBYISHIMO :Wari uzi ko Imana nayo ifuhira uwo ikunda? nkuko umugabo afuhira umugore we?
Ijambo ry’Imana ridusaba guhora tubikora ubudasiba, tukabigira ubuzima bwacu bwa buri munsi, ikindi ijambo ry’Imana rihumuriza abantu babikora, bahora batakira Uwiteka ko azajya abumva.
Ijambo ry’Imana ridusaba gukundana kandi ko nta n’uwavuga ko akunda Imana adakunda mugenzi we.
Ijambo ry’Imana risaba abantu kubaha Imana kandi bagakunda bagenzi babo bakagira ingeso nziza mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi kari ko umuntu atavuga ko akunda Imana adakunda mugenzi we.
Ijambo ry’Imana yacu harimo no kuruhuka imvune zo mu mutima ndetse n’ibikomere. 5. Amasengesho atuma umuntu arindwa Ahangaha twavuga Nowa uburyo yarinzwe ndetse n’umuryango we.

Ikibabaje ariko ni uko abantu bayahumanyije binyuze mu gusuka imyanda mu Nyanja, ibiyaga, imigezi, n’ibindi bidendezi karemano.
Ikibabaje bahitaga bambaza ubwoko bwange kugirango bumve niba ndi muri groupe y'abiciwe cyangwa y'abishe.
Ikibabaje kutavuga ubwoko nabyo ni ikibazo.
Ikibabaje ni uko imvugo nk’izi zigwiriye mu buyobozi kuruta mu baturage.
Ikibabaje rero ubu, n’uko benshi bazi kubyara ariko ntibazi kuba ababyeyi.
Ikibabaje ugasanga bitaranakemuye ikibazo cya service mbi zitangwa n,abayobozi bicaye muri ibyo bizu!

Ikibanza kujyaho ni ibyitwa ‘facial primer’ ibi ngo ni ibituma make-up ifata neza kandi ntipfe no kuvaho.
Ikibanze ni ugutekereza icyo gukora kuko bituma hanatekerezwa buryo ki bwo kukigeraho.
Ikibazo abenshi muri mwe cg n’abandi ni abatazi icyo kuba umukuru w’igihugu aricyo,inshingano ze n’ingaruka bigira mu guhindura itegeko nshinga.
Ikibazo ariko ni uko nâ€™indege ya SN ya mu gitondo yagiye itamujyanye.
Ikibazo ariko ntikiri ku ngano y’inguzanyo cyangwa umubare w’abayoboke ba ADEPR, ikigibwaho impaka ni ukumenya ugomba kwishyura iyo nguzanyo kuko bitana ba mwana.
… Ikibazo cyabaho rwose, ni abayobozi mu nzego z’ibanze, ushobora no kujya kubasaba serivise bakaba batayiguha”.
Ikibazo cy’abatekamutwe biyitirira inzego gikomeje gukaza umurego mu Rwanda.
Ikibazo cyagarutsweho cyane, asubirishwamo inshuro nyinshi kijyanye n’ibyabaye mu matora y’Abadepite mu 2013, aho yavuze ko atabayemo umucyo, anaca amarenga ko we ubwe yibwe amajwi.
Ikibazo cyâ€™imirire mibi mu bana cyagabanutse ngo kuko mu myaka itatu ishize cyavuye ku kigero cya 43% kikagera kuri 36, 7%.
Ikibazo cya M23 cyakunze kutavugwaho rumwe mu karere bamwe bakavuga ko giterwa n’u Rwanda na Uganda, kiza no kubyara ikindi gikomeye ubwo bamwe mu banyaburayi bahagarikaga inkunga zabo, nubwo uko bagendaga bamenya ukuri bazirekuraga.
Ikibazo cy'amatorero ntuzagisanga muri Kiliziya gatorika.
Ikibazo cya rwiyemezamirimo Usengimana Richard cyo kutishyura abaturage yakoresheje yubaka umuhanda uhuza Akarere ka Ngororero n’aka Rutsiro gihera mu 2013 ubwo yawusigaga utuzuye.
Ikibazo cyatangiye mu Kwakira 2016 gikomeza gufata intera ndetse kugera nâ€™aho kirenza kimwe cya gatutu (1/3) yâ€™umusoro wari wateganyijwe.
Ikibazo cy’imirire mibi mu bana gishingiye ku myumvire n’ubumenyi bucye ntabwo gishingiye ku kubura amafunguro nk’uko bivugwa n’abayobozi.
Ikibazo cy’imisoro cyo ntawe kidahangayikishije natwe ubonye uko ayikwepa ni amahirwe aba yitoreye.
Ikibazo cy’impunzi ni kimwe mu bihangayikishije isi muri iyi minsi aho zirushaho kwiyongera umunsi ku wundi, kubona inkunga nabyo bikaba bikomeje kuba ikibazo.
Ikibazo cy’indimi kiri mu byafashe umwanya Abadepite.
Ikibazo cy’inzu zo guturamo mu Mujyi wa Kigali benshi bavuga ko kikiri agatereranzamba, aho kugeza ubu ibiciro by’ubukode, ibyo kugura inzu cyangwa ibibanza bemeza ko kiri hejuru cyane.
Ikibazo cy’izuba mu (.
Ikibazo cyo gucana inyuma hagati y’abashakanye kiri muri bimwe bigora uwaciwe inyuma kwihanganira.
Ikibazo cyo kubura ububobere mu mu gitsina ku bagore, ni kimwe mu bibahangayikisha cyane, ariko kandi ngo hari ibiribwa bishobora gutumakugikemura.
Ikibazo cyo kwimuka bamwe bajya mu Burasirazuba abandi bakajya mu gihugu cya Uganda ariko ahanini baba bashakisha ubutaka kikaba cyarashimangiwe nâ€™Umuyobozi wâ€™Akarere ka Nyabihu, Uwanzwenuwe Theoneste wavuze ko baba bagiye gushaka ubutaka.
Ikibazo cy’ubushobozi bwo kurera izo mpinja agihuriyeho na Muziranenge Jeanne na we wibarutse batatu, nkuko bitangazwa n’umugabo we Bisetsa Muzaneza Freddy.
Ikibazo cy’ubushomeri mu rubyiruko cyakomeje kuvugwa ahubwo aho kugabanuka kikarushaho kwiyongera, ndetse bamwe mu rubyiruko bagaragaza imbogamizi zirimo umusoro bacibwa iyo batangira udushinga twabo ko ubaca intege.
Ikibazo cy’urubyiruko ni ukumva ko batangira bagahita bazamuka, mu gihe iyo uganiriye na benshi mu bagiye babasha kwiteza imbere usanga baratangiriye hasi bakazamuka buhoro buhoro kugeza ubwo bageze aho bari nyuma y’igihe kitari gito.
Ikibazo gihari ni uko nta ‘resource’ (amikoro) dufite zihagije, ni na yo mpamvu hagiyeho ibigenderwaho binakomeye.”
Ikibazo gikomeye kiriho ubu mu Rwanda, dusigaye dukorera ijisho ngo abanyamahanga baturebe badushime aho gukorera abanyarwanda-benegihugu ngo abe aribo badushima.
Ikibazo gikomeye nuko barimo kwiba ICYIZERE zari zifitiwe!
Ikibazo gisigaye kikaba kumenya inshuro abafite amatiyo bayabonamo amazi mu cyumweru, mu kwezi cyangwa mu mwaka.
Ikibazo kimaze hafi imyaka itatu.
Ikibazo kinini ni iyo warenganye kandi nta nzira y'ubujurire isigaye, Rwose urwego rw'umuvunyi aha ho ni ngombwa.
Ikibazo kirahandi kandi nticyoroshye.
Ikibazo kiri mu bihugu byacu Prezida Kagame arakizi, ni icy’abayobozi babi bikunda kurusha uko bakunda ibihugu byabo n’abaturage babo.
Ikibazo ngo ni uko umucuruzi w’inyongeramusaruro ategekwa ingano y’inyongeramusaruro agomba kurangura.
Ikibazo ni abadiventiste bafata ibintu nk’ibirori cyangwa gahunda aho kugirango zitume dusabana n’ijuru nkuko bamwe babitangaza.
Ikibazo nicyo rwose ntakindi.
Ikibazo niko abazanye politiki y’ubuhinzi batigeze bahinga.
Ikibazo ni uko ejo zizasubiraho kubera ikimenyane nkuko zubatswe barebera Ntamugi numwe ku isi utagira kiosque, kereka niba wenda zasanganywe umwanda.
Ikibazo ni uko ubuyobozi bwafashe ikibazo, ni uko bwagikemuye.
Ikibazo ni ukureba ngo hari uburyo Ubutinganyi bwarushaho kwakirwa cyane muri Sosiyete?
Ikibazo nka kiriya gifite ingaruka ku baturage ari mu Busuwisi bagikorera REFERENDUM, iby’iwacu rero ni ugutekerereza abaturage, kubabaza icyo babitekerezaho ashwi!
Ikibazo nk’iki giherutse kugaragara i Musanze. i Musanze ubushize abarwayi babasanze mu cyumba bacumbikiwemo Inteko ihagarariye abavuzi gakondo nayo irabyamagana nubwo hari bamwe muri bo batabikurikiza bagakomeza gucumbikira abarwaye.
Ikibazo nta n’ubwo ali uko ali ubushobozi bubuze ahubwo ni ukuba sport yo mu giturage no mu mashuri nta gaciro ihabwa.
Ikibazo rero ni uko Bibiliya itubwira ko Yesu yari arenze kure kuba umuhanuzi, akarenga kuba umwigisha mwiza akanarenga kuba n’umuntu witangiye Imana.
Ikibazo rero, sinzi niba umuntu ku giti cye, hari icyo yakora.
I Kibeho naho nukujijwa? ntabwo ruriya rukuta rusirwa kubera ko Yesu yahasengeye!
Ikibi cyacu ni kimwe, iyo haje impinduka buri wese usanga ashaka kwerekana ibibi by’abavuye mu nzira, ubu naba bakoma amashyi nibo bazaba ba ruca, bampo, fazi, mu minsi iri imbere.
Ikibi n’uko yagenda noneho nawe ugasigara wicuza uko utigeze umushimisha uvuga ngo iyo mbimenya.
Ikibitandukanya ni igihe amatungo amara ari hanze y’ikiraro.

Iki kibazo gihuriweho n’abagabo benshi.
Iki kibazo gikomera cyane nkiyo umugore atanyurwa n’ ibyo umugabo amuha agahora ararikiye iby’ abandi bafite, ibi bishobora gutuma aca inyuma umugabo we, akaba yamusuzugura, cyangwa akamuhoza ku nkeke amusaba ibintu adafite.

Iki kibazo mugiye kugikoraho iki?
Iki kibazo mwagihaye igihe kingana gute cyo kuba cyabonewe umuti cyane ko Minisitiri w’Intebe aherutse gusaba ko gikemurwa?

’’ Iki kibazo ni gishya kuri twebwe, ariko buriya ubwo bavuga ko bafite iki kibazo turaza kugikurikirana tumenye impamvu, kuko rero ntazi uko giteye, natanga ibyumweru 2 kuba gikemutse."
Iki kibazo ni ihurizo Abanyarwanda benshi badashaka gutekerezaho kuko ngo “iby’ejo bibara ab’ejo” Gusa, nta Munyarwanda wakabaye akibaho bya mbar’ubukeye, cyangwa ngo aryame atizeye ko ejo azaramuka kuko umutekano urahari, ubuzima burahari.
Iki kibazo ni kenshi cyagiye kigarukwaho n’inzego zitandukanye cyane cyane iz’ubutabera, aho bamwe mu baburana mu nkiko batsindwa, basabwa kwishyura ibyo bangije bakiregura ko nta bwishyu bafite.
Iki kibazo nikimwe mu mayobera abaho kw’isi kuko abantu benshi babyibazaho ndetse abenshi bakabura igisubizo nyakuri.

Imibare yakusanyijwe nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™igihugu gishinzwe ubuzimamu Rwanda (RBC) kuva muri Mutarama kugeza muri Kanama muri uyu mwaka wa 2016 yerekana ko abantu 431 bamaze kurumwa nâ€™imbwa zikekwaho ibisazi bwâ€™imbwa ndetse umuntu umwe byamuviriyemo urupfu.
Imibare yerekana ko hagati ya 70%-80% y’abacuruzi bakora ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka ari abagore kandi muri bo 90%, niho bashingiye imibereho yabo ya buri munsi.
Imibare yerekana ko ibinyabuzima byagabanyutseho 58% guhera muri 1970 kugeza ubu, kandi ngo mbere ya 2040 bizaba bimaze gucika ku kigero cya 67%.
Imibare y’ibiro bya WHO muri Afurika igaragaza ko mu myaka mike ishize Afurika yakoze impinduka nyinshi mu buzima nko kugabanya imfu za Malarariya ku kigereranyo cya 66%hagati y’umwaka wa 2000 na 2015.
Imibare y’ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi (RAB) igaragaza ko mu gihembwe cy’ihinga A cya 2016, hagombaga guhuzwa ubutaka bungana na hegitari 624 223 mu gihugu hose, kikaba cyararangiye hahujwe ubungana na 422455, hafi 72%.
Imibare yo mu 2015 igaragaza ko Sweden yari ifite abasirikare 52,000 babigize umwuga muri bo 20 000 bakora mu buryo buharaho abandi bakora mu kazi ko kurinda ingo n’ibigo.
Imibare y’ubu bushakashatsi bushya igaragaza ko 84,9% by’inkuru zitangazwa ziba zishyigikiye politiki za leta naho 6% zitazemeza naho 8,8% zo zizitangaho ibitekerezo.
Imibereho mibi no kubafatirana n’ubujiji bituma benshi koko batarihingutsa ngo bavuge base babana, ahubwo bakihangana bakaba intwari bagasangira icyo babonye n’abana babyaye.
Imibereho nayo ntabwo yatumye bihutira kuryakira.
Imibonano mpuzabitsina ni bimwe mu bintu bya mbere byubaka umubano mwiza hagati y’abakundanye ; cyane rero ngo iyo umugore atwite birafasha ariko birushaho kuba byiza iyo hakurikijwe inama z’uko babikora ntibigire ingaruka mbi ku mwana no ku mugore.

Iterambere ntabwo ribaho ku mahirwe ahubwo umuntu aharanira iterambere.
Iterambere rikomeje kwihuta bijyanye n’umutekano dufite.

Iyi gahunda igamije gufasha abakobwa gukurikira neza amasomo yabo, kumenya uko bakwitwara mu buzima busanzwe haba mu guhitamo amasomo, kumenya kugena icyerekezo, imyitwarire ikwiye ibereye umwana wâ€™Umunyarwandakazi.
Iyi gahunda igamije kunoza ubufatanye no guhuza imbaraga z’ibihugu bya Afurika, Komisiyo y’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bwa Afurika, OMS muri Afurika, A karere ka Mediterranee n’abafatanyabikorwa mu bijyanye no gukingira abana indwara.
Iyi gahunda igiye gutangirira mu Rwanda, biteganyijwe ko izatangira mu Ukwakira uyu mwaka.
Iyi gahunda ishingiye ahanini ku bukangurambaga.
Iyi gahunda kuva yatangira ngo yatanze umusaruro cyane cyane mu guhindura imyumvire ku gutanga serivisi nziza.
Iyi gahunda ngo izafasha ko abafatanyabikorwa bazajya basaranganya ibikorwa aho gusesa umutungo bubaka ikintu kimwe ahantu hamwe, ikindi ngo bizafasha kugenzura inkomoko y’amafaranga no kumenya uko yakoreshejwe.
Iyi gahunda ni amahirwe yo gushimira abakiliya bacu no kubaha ubushobozi bwo kugera ku nzozi n’ibyifuzo byabo.
Iyi gahunda ubu ishobora gutangira gukoreshwa n’Abanyarwanda bose batunze sim-card ya Airtel.
Iyi gahunda umuntu yakoze ngo irimo Ibice bitatu, kandi buri gice gisobanura umubare umwe wa gatandatu.

Iyi gahunda yabaye isomo ku banyamahanga bifuza kuyigana, imaze gutanga umusanzu ukomeye mu rwego rw’ubuzima mu Rwanda kuko uyifite yivuza kare, agakira agasubira mu mirimo ye imuteza imbere; Kurembere mu rugo byabaye amateka.

Iyi mibare (y’abavuga ko Jenoside yakongera kuba n’abibona mu ndorerwamo y’amoko) ubwayo iracyari hejuru, kandi irahagije ngo yangize ubumwe n’ubwiyunge Abanyarwanda bamaze kugeraho haramutse habayeho kurangara (cyane ko gusenya byoroha kuruta kubaka).

Kiliziya Gatolika yubakira ku rumuri rwa Kristu.
Kiliziya Gatulika muri iyi minsi irizihiza yubile yâ€™imyaka 100 imaze ishinzwe mu Rwanda kuko yashinzwe mu 1917, ibi bikaba bihuriranye na yubile yâ€™imyaka 25 ya bariya bapadiri bateje impaka.
Kiliziya Gatulika mu Rwanda iravuga ko ibabajwe n’icyemezo abadepite bafashe cyo gukura intero “Imana Ishobora byose” mu irangashingiro ry’umushinga wo kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga.

Mayor Ndayambaje avuga ko ayo mafaranga miliyoni 20 yahawe abaturage, hasigara abantu badafite ibyangombwa bigaragaza ko koko bakoreye Richard Usengimana bishwanye na Miliyoni zirindwi (7 000 000 Frw).
Mayor Ndayambaje kandi yiyemeje gukurikirana ikibazo cya Muzehe Gasana Elias watereranye na Kampani ye.

Mu 1743, Umudage Paul Ernst Jablonski yagerageje gusobanura ko Christmas yashyizwe kuri 25 Ukuboza kugirango uhurirane n’umunsi wa kiromani wo kwizihiza izuba wa Dies Natalis Solis Invicti.
Mu 1889, Louis Duchesne yavuze ko Noheli yaba yarabariranyijwe nk’amezi icyenda (mbere yo kuvuka) Uhereye kuri 25 z’ukwa gatatu – Werurwe-, ukaba ariwo munsi bizihizaho isamwa rya Yezu (Cyane cyane Kiliziya Gatolika).
Mu 1921-1931, Padiri Schumacher Pierre na we yazanye amabwiriza ye ashingiye ku byo umuntu avuga anumva gusa azanamo amajwi atamenyerewe mu Kinyarwanda nka dj; djy; rdjy; bv.
Mu 1960, Padiri Kagame Alexis yazanye amabwiriza ashingiye ku isesengura ry’amagambo ashyiraho ibihekane bishingiye ku turemajambo (iyigantego).
Mu 1967 igisirikare cyimuye ibirindiro, zishyirwa ku isoko, Vivos izigura mu 2016 aribwo yatangiye kuzivugurura ngo izazigire imitamenwa yo guhungiramo ibyago byâ€™isi byo mu minsi yâ€™imperuka.
Mu 1978 ni bwo umwana wa mbere, Louise Joy Brown yavutse mu buryo bwa FIV.
Mu 1981, Boyer yabaye Umunyamerika wa mbere ukinnye Tour de France, yakinnye iri siganwa inshuro eshanu, ibihe byiza abigira mu 1983 ubwo yabaga uwa 12. Mu gihe cye nk’umukinnyi yatwaye amasiganwa 87 y’abatarabigize umwuga na 49 nk’umunyamwuga.
Mu 1983 nabwo yongeye kwiyamamaza wenyine atorwa ku majwi 99.97% mu gihe ayo ku wa 19 Ukuboza 1988 ari nayo ya nyuma yakozwe ku ngoma ye, yayatsinze ntawe bahanganye ku kigero cya 99.98%.
Mu 1990, mbere yâ€™uko FPR itangira urugamba, Barril yakoze igenzura ryâ€™ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda.
Mu 1991 hakozwe amatora ya ″referendumu″ yari igamije kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga ryemeza ubwiganze bw’amashyaka ya politiki, bitandukanye n’uko byari bisanzwe, aho ishyaka rimwe ari ryo ryabaga ryemewe n’amategeko y’igihugu.
Mu 1992-1993 yigaga muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, ndetse hagati ya 2000 na 2003 akomereza amashuri muri Kaminuza ya Yaoundé muri Cameroun aho yakuye impamyabumenyi mu iyigandimi.
Mu 1992 nibwo yemerewe kuririmba ku Mudugudu wa Kacyiru, icyo gihe wabarizwaga muri Paruwase ya Kimihurura.
Mu 1994, Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yabaye mu Rwanda yantwaye abo mu muryango wanjye hafi ya bose, intwara ibihumbi by’inshuti zanjye zose nagiraga mu Rwanda.
Mu 1 Abakorinto ibice 12–14, Pawulo avuga ku mpano z’ibitangaza, agira ati: “Ariko none bene Data, ninza iwanyu mvuga indimi zitamenyekana nzabamarira iki, nintababwira ibyo mpishuriwe cyangwa mpawe kumenya, cyangwa guhanura cyangwa kwigisha?”
Mu 2005 yitabirirye imurika ry’imideli ryari ryateguwe na Rosalie Gicanda, igitaramo kibera muri Centre Culturel Franco-Rwandais.
Mu 2006/2007 na Chelsea yakomeye amashyi Manchester United ya Sir Alex Ferguson.
Mu 2008 ubwo hari imvururu za politiki muri Zimbabwe abarenga 3000 barimo abana batagira kivurira 100 bahungiye mu nyubako z’iryo torero.
Mu 2009 u Rwanda rwatunganyaga Megawatt (MW) 89, ku bw’imbaraga nyinshi zakoreshejwe, mu 2016 akaba yari ageze kuri MW 190 bingana n’ubwiyongere bwa 46.8%, ndetse umubare w’ingo zifite amashanyarazi uva ku 142,497 zigera ku 617, 250 muri iyo myaka.
Mu 2010 biciye kuri BBC hatangajwe amabanga yo muri FIFA mu kiganiro kitwa Panorama havugwa uburyo Hayatou yafashe ruswa mu myaka ya 1990 mu byo gutanga uburenganzira kuri za televiziyo mu kwerekana igikombe cy’isi.
Mu 2010, Perezida Paul Kagame nka Perezida wa FPR yagize ati “Duharanira UBUMWE kuko tuzi ko umuryango ushobora kuzima iyo ujemo amacakubiri ntahoshwe; naho umuryango wunze ubumwe urasugira, ugasagamba.”
Mu 2010, ubwo Paul Kagame yatsindiraga kongera kuyobora u Rwanda, igipimo cy’ubwiyunge (reconciliation) cyari kuri 82.3%, mu 2015 cyari kigeze kuri 92.5% haburaho 2.5% ngo byuzure intego ya 95%.
Mu 2011 hatangajwe uburyo we na mugenzi we ukomoka iwabo Jacques Anouma bafashe ruswa ya USD 1,5 miliyoni bayihawe n’igihugu cya Qatar ngo bagishyigikire mu kubaha kwakira igikombe cy’isi cya 2022.
Mu 2011 ubwo iyi nzu itunganya imyambaro yafunguraga imiryango icyo gihe yari ifite intego yo gukora imideli mishya kandi irimo ubuhanga bwerekana inkomoko y’ibyo bakora hagendewe ku kwihesha agaciro.
Mu 2011, yahawe ikindi gihembo n’ihuriro (groupe) rya za Ambasade z’ibihugu byose by’Afurika mu Buholandi.
Mu 2012 habarurwaga ko Abanyarwanda bageze kuri miliyoni 10,5, mu gihe ubu habarurwa hafi miliyoni 12. Ubu bwiyongere ni kimwe mu bihagangayikishije ibihugu, bigatuma hashyirwaho uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro.
Mu 2012, Musabyimana yaguye ibikorwa bye akajya yigisha abana bose bavuka mu miryango itishoboye, ari na ho havuye igitekerezo cyo gushinga umuryango yise Peace and Hope Initiative (Amahoro n’Icyizere) ufasha abana bakomoka mu miryango itishoboye.
Mu 2012 nibwo yarangije amashuri yisumbuye muri Denmark aho atuye, ababyeyi be bakiriye ikifuzo cye cyo gukomeza kaminuza mu birebana no kwiga gukora film no kuzikina aho yabonye ishuri i London mu 2013 arangiza mu 2015 muri Rada and Farringdon studios.
Mu 2012, Rupari yaserukiye u Rwanda i Abidjan muri ivory cost, aho yari agiye kwerekana collection y’imyenda ye ku butumire bwa L’ong Heye yari yateguye icyo bise Prix Heye.
Mu 2013 Merkel yamaganiye kure gushyingira abahuje ibitsina mu Budage agaragaza inyungu ku bana ku bashakanye.
Mu 2013, u Rwanda, Uganda na Kenya bashinze umuhora wa ruguru (Northern Corridor), ndetse yatumirwagamo n’ibindi bihugu bya EAC, hagamijwe kurushaho kwihutisha imishinga y’iterambere ibihugu byo mu karere bihuriyeho.
Mu 2013, yatoranyijwe nk’umurika imideli neza muri Cyprus, ibyo byamufashije kwerekeza i Beirut muri Liban mu 2014 kumurika imideli mu gikorwa cya Top Model International icyo gihe yari ahagarariye u Rwanda.
Mu 2014, Ingabire yashatse umugore, we ubona, ngo yabengutse agendeye ku buryo yamufataga uko amwumva mu ijwi n’uko abandi bamubona bamuvuga; ubu babyaranye abana babiri, umuhungu n’umukobwa, badafite ubu bumuga bwa se.
Mu 2015 mu nama ihuza ibihugu bya Africa n’Ubushinwa, iki gihugu cyemeye ishoramari rya miliyari $60 mu iterambere rya Africa.
Mu 2016 iki gitaramo cyaciye kuri Televiziyo y’igihugu, abatari babonye uko bitabira nabo babasha kubirebera kuma Televiziyo zabo.
Mu 2016, Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika yo hagati n’Iburasirazuba (CECAFA) ryananiwe gutegura iyi mikino ku mpamvu Umunyamabanga waryo, Nicholas Musonye avuga ko ari iza politiki.
Mu 2016, MINECOFIN yavugaga ko inyigo yamaze gukorwa ndetse n’inyandiko y’ibisabwa ihari, igisigaye ari ugushaka amafaranga yo kubaka biriya byambu, ariko ntibishoboka ko byakubakwa muri iyi Manda.
MU 2016, mu gitaramo cya Rwanda Modesty Fashion Show.
Mu 2016, Tirol Cycling Team yari mu makipe yari yiyandikishije kwitabira Tour du Rwanda bihinduka ku munota wa nyuma.
Mu 2016 ubwo yafunguraga iyo nzu, ngo byamufashije gushyira imbaraga mu buhanzi bwe, benshi mu bakurikiranira hafi ibyerekeranye na fashion batangira kumubonamo impano idasanzwe.
Mu 2017, iki gitaramo cya CollectiveRw Fashion Week.

Muba mwagobotse aho rukomeye, mwakoze ibyo benshi batinya kandi banga.

Mu bayobozi aba mbere bakurikiwe cyane kuri Instagram haza Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Buhinde Narendra Modi ukurikirwa n’abantu miliyoni 6.8, agakurikirwa na Donald Trump ukurikirwa n’abantu miliyoni 6.3.
Mu bayobozi batadukanye bari bitabiriye iki gikorwa cyatangiye saa tatu z’ijoro kigasoza saa sita, bavuze ko batarajwe ijoro n’umukobwa utazesa imihigo ye.
Mu bazajya bajyanwa kuri aya mashusho harimo abanyeshuri bakora ubushakashatsi n’abanyamakuru.
Mu bibabzo izi telefoni zari zifite birimo guturika kwa batiri zazo bigenda bigira ubukana kugeza ubwo uruganda rwiyemeza guhagarika kuzicuruza.
Mu bibazo abaturage bakunze kugeza ku buyobozi bukuru bw’igihugu usanga bishingiye kuri iki kibazo, aho usanga hari ababa barabariwe imitungo y’abo ahantu haba hateganywa kubakwa ibikorwa remezo ariko hagashira imyaka batishyuwe.
Mu bice bikurikiyeho, Yesu ntiyakosoye ngo yisobanure ati, “Sinigeze mvuga ko ndi Imana.”
Mu bice by’icyaro mu murenge wa Nyarusange bavuga ko Perezida uzatorwa yabubakira ibibuga by’imyidagaduro kuko ntabyo bafite hano.
Mu biganiro biri kuba, abahanzi bari gushishikarizwa gukora ibihangano bifite akamaro, aho kuba hari ibyo birimo gutesha agaciro igitsina gore.
Mu biganiro bitandukanye bibera mu nama mpuzamahanga ku ikoranabuhanga mu guhindura Afurika iteraniye i Kigali ku nshuro ya kabiri yiswe ‘Transform Africa’, kimwe cyibanze ku gushishikariza abagore n’abakobwa mu kurushaho gukoresha ikoranabuhanga.
Mu biganiro byabaye se acyiriho, byemejwe ko amatora azaba umwaka wa 2017 urangira.
Mu biganiro byahuje aba banyacyubahiro, havuzwe ku ngingo zijyanye n’umubano u Rwanda rufitanye na Vatican nk’uko Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yabigaragaje mu itangazo yasohoye.
Mu biganiro yagiye agirana n’itangazamakuru ntiyahwemaga kuvuga ko hari abahanzi afata nk’inararibonye mu muziki barimo Cécile Kayirebwa na Rugamba Cyprien.
Mu bigaragara kandi ntakeneye icumbi gusa kuko akeneye no gufashwa kwiteza imbere akabona ikibeshaho abana be.
Mu bigize na none urwungano rw’imyakura harimo n’uruti rw’umugongo.
Mu bigo henshi usanga amatangazo agira ati “Niba utishimiye serivisi uhawe cyangwa ufite ikibazo, hamagara izi nomero zitishyurwa.”
Mu bigo hirya no hino no mu modoka zitwara abagenzi hagiye hari nomero za telefoni zitishyurwa ziba zanditseho ngo “niba ugize ikibazo, hamagara iyi nomero” nyamara abazifashisha ni mbarwa.

Mu bihe bigoranye Imana ijya yitamurura tukabibona Posted by: IBYISHIMO.
Mu bihe bikomeye bakunze kwirengera ingaruka, naho mu kazi barangwa n’ umurava, ibakwe ndetse no kumva ko ibyo bakora bibareba kandi bagomba kubisohoza neza.
Mu bihe bitandukanye nagize amahirwe yo guhura na Perezida Kagame nkumva impanuro ze, nka kumwe uba umusuhuje cyangwa se n’ahandi.
Mu bihe by’imvura, abantu bakunze kwibasirwa n’indwara z’ibicurane (grippe), ku muntu wariye isoso y’inkoko burya ngo ntaho ashobora guhurira n’udukoko dutera iyi ndwara.
Mu bihugu 15 bigize aka kanama, 11 byatoye byemeza ko mu Burundi hagomba koherezwayo aba bapolisi.
Mu bihugu 43 byatanze imibare, u Rwanda ruri mu bihugu 15 bifite abaturage bari hejuru ya miliyoni eshatu z’abaturage batarya ngo bahage birimo na Tanzania, Uganda, na Kenya byo mu karere.
Mu bihugu bifite ubukungu buto birimo n’u Rwanda, ubukungu ngo buzazamukaho 5.4% mu 2017, na 5.8% mu 2018-19 kubera ibiciro ku masoko mpuzamahanga biri kongera kuzamuka.
Mu bihugu bigize Umuryango w’Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, u Rwanda ni rwo rufite inzobere nyinshi mu bijyanye n’amaraso kuko rufite abagera kuri batatu mu gihe muri Uganda na Tanzania nta n’umwe uretse u Burundi bufite umwe.
Mu bihugu bikennye ho ngo usanga n’uyu mubare urenga, bigaragaza ubushake bwo kuva mu bukene ibi bihugu bifite.
Mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe, ababyeyi babyaye abana bafite ubumuga bwa clubfoot usanga bibasirwa nk’aho aribo babigizemo uruhare, ibyo bigatuma habaho amakimbirane mu miryango, hakabaho umutekano mucye ndetse umugore n’umugabo bakaba banatandukana burundu.
Mu bihugu bitandukanye haba umuhango wo kwibuka.
Mu bihugu byateye imbere umubiri w’umuntu usigaye waragizwe igicuruzwa mu bucuruzi bwinshi butandukanye burimo n’abigana gusa na bimwe mu bihangano bikoreshwa mu kugaragaza amasura atabaho ku isi harimo anateye ubwoba.
Mu bihugu byinshi amashuri atangira muri Nzeri, uko ibihe biteye mu Rwanda iyo mpenshyi, budget year mu Rwanda itangingira mukwa 6 bivugako muri Nzeri aba amaze kuboneka, n’ibindi n’ibindi.
Mu bihugu byose bigendera kuri demokarasi, amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta usanga atizwa cyane umurindi n’imikorere mibi y’ishyaka riba riri ku butegetsi.
Mu bihugu nka America hari amashyirahamwe menshi arwanya Coca cola bitewe nuko bavumbuye ibibi byayo kuko yangiza.
Mu bihugu nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, u Budage, u Buholandi, Israel n’ahandi biremewe ko uwabisaba yahabwa uburenganzira bwo gutorera aho ari, akohereza ijwi rye rikabarurwa.
Mu bijyanye n’ imyitwarire, umuntu ufite amaraso ya A yihugiraho, gusa ariko akaba umuntu wihangana, wifata agapfira muri Nyagasani.
Mu bijyanye no guteza imbere demokarasi, Mpayimana yavuze ko gahunda ihari aho abanyamabanga nshingwabikorwa b’imirenge bashyirwaho na leta, ibi ngo azabihindura.
Mu bijyanye no kunoza isoko, iki kigega gishobora gutanga inguzanyo ku bikorera bato n’abaciriritse ingana na miliyoni 40.7 kugeza kuri 814.5 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, binyuze muri banki y’ubucuruzi umukiriya akorana na yo.
Mubijyanye n’ubuvuzi mu Rwanda dufite abaganga ariko batajyanye n’igihe nabusa, babandi usanga tugomba kuvurwa n’abaganga bavuye hanze cyangwa bikadusaba kujyayo kugirango turonke abaganga nyabaganga.
Mu bikomeye ashinjwa harimo amafaranga yashyizwe mu kigega CICO arenga Miliyoni Magana ane yose yaburiwe irengero nâ€™ubwo icyo kibazo bakitanaho ba mwana nâ€™ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR.
Mu bikoresho batanze, buri muryango wagenewe ibiro 25 by’umuceri, litilo eshanu z’amavuta yo guteka, imiti ibiri n’igice y’isanune n’ibiro 12 n’igice by’isukali.
Mu bikorwa byo kwiyamamaza, biteganyijwe ko umukandida wa FPR azahera mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo mu karere ka Ruhango na Nyanza tariki 14 Nyakanga, akomereze Nyaruguru Gisagara (15), Nyamagabe,Huye na Kamonyi (16), Muhanga na Ngororero(17 Nyakanga).
Mu bikorwa n’ubukanguramba bwo kurwanya ruswa, Leta y’u Rwanda n’abayobozi batandukanye bakunze kwifashisha imvugo igira iti “zero tolerance to corruption” (kutihanganira na busa ruswa).

Mukomereze ago, n’ayo mabuno ya buri kanya araturyohera.
Mukomereze aho ; ariko na none mushyire kandi mwongere imbaraga mu gukumira ibyaha."
Mukomereze aho muracyari aba mbere… mbega ntawabasimbura Umuseke mukomeze kuba ingenzi mukubaka umuryango nyarwanda.
Mukomeze guharanire kuba intangarugero muri byose ntimuzahe na rimwe icyuho amacakubiri n’ibinyoma biba bigamije kudindiza iterambere.”
Mukomeze kugira umwete buri wese mu kazi akora.
Mukomeze mukunde ikipe yanyu muyibe hafi pe kuko ni ikipe nziza cyane.
Mukomeze mutere imbere muteza imbere ireme ry’uburezi, muri indashyikirwa turabemera.
Mukora neza cyane!
Mukore akazi muve mumatiku, mufashe abaturage bave mu bukene.
Mukore ibyanyu bibateza imbere, mureke abandi babeho uko bashaka. bapfa kuba ntaburenganzira bw’abandi bantu babangamiye.
Mukore neza, ubabare uyu munsi ineza izagusange imbere, uhemuke uyu munsi inabi izagusange imbere.”
Mukorere hamwe havanweho ibivugwa ko Afurika yarazwe kutizerwa kurusha andi masoko yateye imbere.”

NEC ishinzwe gutegura amatora mu mucyo no mu bwisanzure.
NEC itangaza ko mbere ya 2008, impapuro zakoreshwaga mu matora zakorerwaga hanze y’u Rwanda habanje gutangwa amasoko ku macapiro, izakoreshejwe mu matora y’Umukuru w’igihugu ya 2003 zakorewe mu Bwongereza.
NEC itangaza ko mu Rwanda ibikoresho birimo n’impapuro zizatorerwaho bizatangira kugezwa ku masite y’itora ku wa 31 Nyakanga, ikavuga ko yifuza ko bizagera ku wa 3 Kanama 2017 byarangiye.
NEC itangaza ko mu Rwanda ibikoresho bizatorerwaho bizatangira kugezwa ku masite ku wa 31 Nyakanga, ikavuga ko yifuza ko bizagera ku wa 3 Kanama 2017 byarangiye.
NEC ivuga ko hari n’abo byagaragaye ko basinye kabiri, abandi ugasanga kanaka yasinyiwe n’abandi.
NEC kandi itangaza ko ibikorwa byo kwikosoza kuri lisiti z’itora byitabiriwe cyane kuko nibura byakozwe ku kigero cya 97% mu gihugu hose.
NEC mu matora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu ya 2017 yashyizeho uburyo buzorohereza buri Munyarwanda gutora umukandida yifuza.
NEC nihite isaba ikigo gitanga indangamuntu gutesha agaciro izo ndangamuntu zose z’abasinya ibitandukanye n’ibiri kuki ndangamuntu zabo.
NEC Ntiyemeranya n’abashinja urubyiruko kuba ba ntibindeba Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Amatora ishimangira ko urubyiruko ari inkingi ya mwamba mu bikorwa bitandukanye, bityo ko abantu bakwiye kujya bareka kuruharabika bavuga ko rutitabira gahunda za leta.
NEC yakiriye Barafinda nk’umukandida wigenga n’ubwo mu kirango cye hagaragaramo amagambo yerekana ko afite ishyaka.
NEC yakoze akazi kayo kandi yagakoze neza.
NEC yavuze ko izafatanya n’izindi nzego zishinzwe iby’ikoranabuhanga kugira ngo hakumirwe icyaha icyo ari cyo cyose cyakorwa kiganisha ku matora.

Ni byiza nkuko twabivuze ko mubanza kubiganiraho.
Ni byiza rero ko buri mugore wese yumva ko umugabo ari mugenzi we Imana yamuhaye ngo babane mu mahoro, mu bwumvikane, mu bwuzuzanye no mu bwubahane.
Ni byiza rero ko muri iyi siporo, abantu batangira kujya babwirwa ko kubungabunga ibidukikije bitagarukira gusa ku gusukura imihanda, ahubwo no kugabanya ibitera ibyuka bihumanya tugahumeka umwuka mwiza.
Ni byiza rero ko niba twifuza kuba inshuti z’Imana twirinda amaboko avusha amaraso.
Ni byiza rero ko umugabo amenya ndetse akaniga uburyo anyaza umugore we ; ibi bikajyana no kugenzura umuvuduko akoresha ; yakumva agiye kurangiza agakoresha uburyo aba aretseho gato kugirango abashe gufasha umugore we baze kurangiriza rimwe.

Ni icyemezo cyafashwe, kuri uyu wa 1 Werurwe 2017, mu bujurire uyu munyamakuru yari yaratanze ku kibazo yagiranye na Kaminuza ya UTAB (University of Technology and Arts of Byumba).
Ni icyemezo cyafashwe na leta kikaba cyaratangiye gushyirwa mu bikorwa ejo hashize.
Ni icyemezo cyafashwe n’inama y’abaminisitiri hagamijwe kubakira ubushobozi izi nganda kugira ngo zisuganye zibashe kugaburira isoko ryo mu Rwanda nyuma y’aho leta ifatiye icyemezo cyo guca caguwa.
