Ni ikibazo cya politiki.
Ni ikibazo cyashyizwe ahagaragara n’abaturage bibumbiye mu matsinda (Clubs) yo kurwanya kanyanga azwi nka ‘Anti-Kanyanga’ yashinzwe mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ikibazo cy’ibiyobyabwenge.
Ni ikibazo cyumvikana mu mirenge itandukanye y’Akarere ka Gakenke.
Ni ikibazo gikomeye kugeza ubu ntitwamenya ngo kizakemuka ryari kuko Akarere na ko kaduhoza ku cyizere.”
Ni ikibazo Izubarirashe.rw twamenyeshwe n’abaturage bo mu Mirenge ya Muyongwe, Ruli na Muhondo, gusa kinavugwa no mu yindi mirenge itandukanye y’Akarere ka Gakenke.
Ni ikibazo kigaragara mu mirenge hafi ya yose uko ari 19. Imibare yatanzwe n’ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y’abaturage (EICV 3) bwakozwe mu mwaka wa 2011, yagaragaje ko Akarere ka Gakenke kari gatuwe n’abaturage 345,000 icyo gihe.
Ni ikibazo kigaragara mu Mirenge hafi ya yose y’Akarere ka Burera ukuyemo uwa Cyanika na Butaro irimo Sitasiyo.
Ni ikibazo kivugwa hirya no hino mu mujyi wa Kigali, aho hari n’abibaza impamvu bacibwa amafaranga y’umutekano ariko bakwibwa bikarangirira aho, abashinzwe umutekano ntibabibazwe.
Ni ikibazo umuvugizi w’uru rwego avuga ko giteye inkeke kuko “bituma abaturage bata icyizere bari bafitiye Urwego rw’Umuvunyi ndetse bikagaragaza ko mu gihugu harimo ruswa kandi ari abiyitirira inzego.”

Perezida Kagame yagaragaje ko muri Afurika hari amahirwe y’ishoramari mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo nko kubaka imihanda, ibiraro, ingomero z’amashanyari, inzira za gari ya moshi n’ibyambu, ashimangira ko abikorera ari bo musingi w’uburumbuke.

Perezida Kagame yageze no ku ngingo yo gutera inkunga ibikorwa bya AU, ingingo yafashweho umwanzuro n’abakuru b’ibihugu ko bagomba kwishakamo ubushobozi bukenewe mu gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda z’umuryango.
Perezida Kagame yagiriye uruzinduko mu Isiraheli Perezida Kagame ubwo yakiraga Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Isiraheli Benjamin Netanyahu mu Rwanda ku wa 6 Nyakanga 2016.
Perezida Kagame yahawe inshingano zo kuyobora amavugurura mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe, AU mu nama ya 27 yahuje abakuru b’ibihugu na za guverinama, yabereye i Kigali umwaka ushize.
Perezida Kagame yahawe izi nshingano ubwo AU yari iyobowe na Perezida Idris Deby, ariko muri Mutarama aza gusimburwa na Alpha Condé wa Guinea mu buryo abakuru b’ibihugu bagenda basimburanamo buri mwaka.
Perezida Kagame yahise afungura ku mugaragaro ikoreshwa ry’iyi nyubako y’Umuryango wa RPF-Inkotanyi.
Perezida Kagame yakomeje ati “ kudakoresha iby’iwacu byiza tukararikira iby’ahandi bibi biterwa ahanini no kutiha agaciro.”
Perezida Kagame yakomeje avuga ko mu mezi make u Rwanda ruzatangira ikindi cyiciro cy’urugendo rw’Igihugu, bityo asaba ko abitabiriye iyi Nama y’Igihugu y’Umushyikirano ko bazakorana umurava mu gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro izavamo.
Perezida Kagame yakomoje ku bayobozi badakora akazi bashinzwe ahubwo bagashaka kubeshya ko bakora, avuga ko bitazabahira kuko ibikorwa ubwabyo bizabatamaza.
Perezida Kagame yanagarutse ku itangazamakuru mpuzamahanga ngo rikunze gusebya u Rwanda, buvuga ko abaturage bifuje ko referendum yabaho cyaba ari igitugu bashyizweho, asobanura ko niba cyaba ari igitugu iryo kosa ari we wakaribazweho.
Perezida Kagame yanagarutse ku mavugurura yakozwe mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe avuga ko hakenewe ko Abanyafurika bashyira mu bikorwa impinduka zikenewe ngo uyu mugabane utere imbere.

Perezida Kagame yanenze bikomeye abapfobya Jenoside, bajya impaka ku nyito y’ibyabaye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yahitanye abasaga miliyoni mu mezi atatu.
Perezida Kagame yanenze bikomeye abapfobya Jenoside, bajya impaka ku nyito y’ibyabaye Perezida Kagame akigera ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali.
Perezida Kagame yasabye aba bana kugeza ubu butumwa ku bandi bana batitabiriye iki gikorwa, ndetse hari n’ubwo hazabaho igihe cyo kubasanga aho bari.
Perezida Kagame yasabye abanyarwanda gukomeza kwishakamo ibisubozo, bagamije kwiteza imbere aho kuba gushimisha amahanga.
Perezida Kagame yasabye abayobozi gucika ku ngeso yo kubeshya Ubwo yasozaga Umwiherero w’abayobozi bakuru b’Igihugu, Perezida Kagame yabasabye gucika ku ngeso mbi yo kubeshya kuko amaherezo ukuri kugaragara.

Perezida Kagame yashimangiye ko ayo mashyaka yahisemo neza n’ubwo hari ibyo yaba adahuriyeho na FPR, avuga ko ari ibyi gushimirwa cyane.

Perezida Kagame yavuze ko umubyeyi we yamutoje ‘kubabarira, kutitura inabi abayimugiriye ahubwo agahora ari umunyembabazi’.

Polisi y’u Rwanda iratangaza ko umutekano muri iki gihe cyo kwamamaza abakandida kumwanya wa Perezida wa Repubulika ari wose haba ahiyamamarizwa, mu muhanda ndetse no mu gihugu hose.
Polisi y’u Rwanda iratangaza ko umutekano wifashe neza muri iki gihe cy’amatora, haba ahabera ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza, no mu bikorwa byo gutwara abantu bajya cyangwa bava muri ibyo bikorwa.
Polisi y’u Rwanda ivuga ko mu minsi itanu ishize ibyo bikorwa bitangiye umutakano usesuye, aho nta gikorwa na kimwe cy’ubugizi bwa nabi kigeze kibaho.
Polisi y’u Rwanda mu karere ka Gasabo ifungiye kuri Sitasiyo ya Kacyiru umukozi wo mu rugo ukekwaho kwiba umukoresha we asaga miliyoni imwe y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, telefone ebyiri ngendanwa zo mu bwoko bwa Samsung S7, n’amadolari 100 ya Amerika.
Polisi y’u Rwanda mu karere ka Gatsibo yatahuye inzengero z’inzoga zitemewe mu Rwanda kuko zitujuje ubuziranenge ; zahise zisenywa, ndetse n’inzoga zafashwe zirangizwa.
Polisi y’u Rwanda mu karere ka Gicumbi, ku wa 6 Kamena uyu mwaka yafashe imodoka ipakiye inzoga z’amoko atandukanye zitemewe kwinjizwa no gucuruzwa mu Rwanda.
Polisi y’u Rwanda mu turere twa Karongi na Ngororero yafatanye abagabo babiri magendu y’amabuye y’agaciro yo mu bwoko bwa Gasegereti na Amethyst.
Polisi y’u Rwanda yashinzwe mu 2000; mu myaka imaze ikaba yarakozemo ibikorwa binyuranye birimo kubungabunga umutekano haba mu gihugu no hanze yacyo mu butumwa bunyuranye.
Polisi y’u Rwanda yashyikirije ibi bitaro Minisante nayo ikazabiha akarere ka Gasabo, kikaba ari igikorwa kigamije kudatatanya imbaraga no kugirango hanozwe (.

Rayon Sports yabonye igitego cya kabiri ku munota wa 90 ubwo umupira waterwaga na Ndayisenga Jean d’Amour wahindurirwaga icyerekezo na Twagizimana Fabrice akitsinda igitego.
Rayon Sports yahinduye umukino, Nahimana Shassir akinana na Nshuti Savio nka ba rutahizamu bo hagati.
Rayon Sports yahise igeza amanota 67 yegukana igikombe cya shampiyona nyuma yo gutsinda uwo mukino, kuko yahise irusha APR FC amanota 13 ikaba ifite amanota 54 ku mwanya wa kabiri.
Rayon Sports yaje kwishyura ibyo bitego bitsinzwe na Mugisha François na Shassir Nahimana.
Rayon Sports yaje kwishyura icyo gitego gitsinzwe na Tidiane Kone muri icyo gice cya mbere.
Rayon Sports yakinnye umukino wayo, ariko ntiyabona intsinzi muri uwo mukino ubanza wabereye muri Nigeria kuri iki cyumweru tariki ya 16 Mata 2017.
Rayon sports yakoze imyitozo kuri uyu wa kabiri kuri stade Umumena idafite bamwe mu bakinnyi bayo nka Rwatubyaye Abdoul utemerewe gukina iyi mikino ya CAF kubera ibyangombwa na Abouba Sibomana urwaye imitsi yo mu matako.
Rayon Sports yamaze gutandukana na Nshuti Dominique Savio wagiye muri AS Kigali yaguze kandi Niyigena Jules wakiniraga AS Muhanga mu cyiciro cya kabiri, bombi basinye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri.
Rayon Sports yamaze kwegukana icyo gikombe n’ubwo hasigaye umukino umwe ngo shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere irangire.
Rayon Sports yatangaje abakinnyi izifashisha muri shampiyona harimo 2 bakorera ahandi Rayon Sports yatangaje abakinnyi 27 izifashisha muri shampiyona ya 2016/2017 barimo Imanishimwe Emmanuel uba muri APR FC na Rwatubyaye Abdoul udahari.
Rayon Sports yatwaye igikombe cya shampiyona ubwo yatsindaga Mukura Victory Sports 2-1 mu mukino uheruka.
Rayon Sports yegukanye igikombe yaguye miswi na Pepiniere Rayon Sports yamaze kwegukana igikombe cya shampiyona ya 2016-2017 yaguye miswi ya 2-2 na Pepiniere FC yamaze gusubira mu cyiciro cya kabiri.
Rayon sports yihariye igice cya kabiri cyane kuko Manishimwe Djabel, Nahimana Shasir na Moussa Camara babonye uburyo bwo gutera mu izamu ariko ba myugariro ba APR FC; Herve Rugwiro, Aimable Nsabimana na Emery Mvuyekure bakomeza kwitwara neza.
Rayssa Teixeiro Melo wari mu kiganiro yambaye imyambaro bajyana mu bwogero ubwo yari kuri television yo muri Brazil yakubise umusore wari umukoze ku kibuno ubwo bari mu gikorwa cyo kwamamaza amavuta yitwa Bronze +.
RBC itangaza ko ugereranyije mu Rwanda abafite hejuru y’imyaka 15 barwaye Hepatite C na B bari hagati ya 3% na 4%, mu gihe abarengeje imyaka 45 bo basaga 10%.
RBC yari yateganyije ko abazakingirwa ari n’abazasuzumwa ari abagera ku bihumbi 16, ariko abakeneye iyi service babaye benshi cyane harimo ngo n’abavuye mu tundi turere.
RCFS ni igikorwa ngarukamwaka gitegurwa n’Isosiyeti yitwa IRIS PRO-FILMS 1000 HILLS LTD igamije guteza imbere abanyamideli.
RCWP ni umuryango udaharanira inyungu ukomoka ku bagore bahawe ubupadiri mu 2002 na Musenyeri Rómulo Antonio Braschi, witandukanyije na Kiliziya gatolika.
RDB ntibemerera kuba bakoresha imiti izica (ingona) ikindi Leta ntibaha amazi NGO bareke kuvoma Nyabarongo.
RDC yanagaragaje ko yamaze kugeza mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko umushinga ushyiraho ABAKIR, Sena ikaba yaramaze kuwemeza, hakaba hategerejwe umwanzuro w’Umutwe w’abadepite.
RDF dukesha iyi nkuru, yatangaje ko uretse ibirori byo gusezerera bariya basirikare bakuru byaraye bibereye ku cyicaro cyayo gikuru ku Kimihurura, ngo hanabaye ibirori bisezerera aba ofisiye bato n’abandi bafite andi mapeti byagiye bibera aho bakorera.
RDG ivuga ko iri shyamba ricumbikiye inyoni z’agahebuzo mu Rwanda, Nyungwe irimo amoko agera kuri 300 y’inyoni, muri yo amoko 24 aboneka mu mashyamba macye y’ikibaya Kigali cya Albertine.

Serivisi za Call Rwanda zikenerwa bitewe n’igihe rukana umuntu agezemo nko gutumira mu birori runaka, gutanga amatangazo, kubikira abantu ko wagize ibyago n’ibindi.
Serivisi zo kubika amakuru y’urubuga rwa internet n’aya email, byagabanyijweho 88% biba amafaranga 2,025 ku kwezi, bivuze ko ku mwaka ari 24, 300 Frw kuri serivisi ya mbere ihendutse.

Twakomeje gutegereza ko baza kutubwira karibu igihe baziye Brown afungura umuryango Nelson avamo maze turamugaragira tumanuka twitonze batuvugirizwa impundu n’ababyeyi.
Twakomeje kandi gushaka amakuru mu kiganiro gito twagiranye n’ umuturage utashatse kuvuga amazina ye ku bw’umutekano we yavuze ko iryo rushanwa ryabaye abantu bazaga no gufana, nyuma bose bagatangazwa n’uko ibihembo bibuze.
Twakomeje kuganira byiza hashize akanya twumva umuntu uri gukomanga cyane Brendah arahaguruka ajya kureba uwo ari we hashize akanya aragaruka.
Twakomeje kuganira byiza, ibyishimo byari byose kwa kugaragira Joy namubwiye kwabyaye amaranamutima asesa uturira ku maso ye, nanjye ashoka ajya mu nda, bigoranye ndamusezera ndataha.
Twakomeje kuganira dusoma no kudu fanta, Papa Sacha agira icyo avuga maze abashaka gutaha batangira gutaha na ba Nelson bahabwa kalibu bakomereza iwabo na Mireille.
Twakomeje kuganira hashize akanya katari gato mbona Zamu arampamagaye ndamwitaba maze ambwira ko amaze kuva mu modoka turishyura tujya kumufata aho imodoka zihagarara ubundi turagaruka twinjira mu modoka dufata urugendo twerekeza aho Zamu yatweretse.
Twakomeje kuganira njye na Mapiki hashize umwanya utari munini cyane tubona Louis baramugaruye akicara hasi, Mapiki- “Wihangane ndabona nawe amatama atukura” Louis- “Ntacyo ariko bamufate ndamutanze n’iyo naba ndi se ntabwo nakwemera kuzira amaherere!”
Twakomeje kugenda Jane na we akomeza kuvugira kuri telephone, ubwo Jane aho aviriye kuri telephone yahise atubwira.
Twakomeje kugenda ku muvuduko mwinshi ari na ko tuniganirira byinshi byerekeye akazi twiteguraga gutangira mu gihe kitari gito tuba twinjiye mu mujyi.
Twakomeje kugenda tugana kuri station ya police, mu nzira nakomeje kugenda ntekereza byinshi, nakomeje kurengwa n’agahinda k’ibyabaga kuri njye mpaka tuhageze, Afande-“Ngaho vamo vuba se tugukize iri zuba!”
Twakomeje kujyana n’uwo muvandimwe, gusa kuza kwanjye nabyo byabaye ikibazo.
Twakomeje kumanuka njye na Sacha, nubwo bwari bwije kandi turi ahantu tutazi n’umuntu n’umwe ntacyo twishishaga.
Twakomeje kuryoherwa n’ibihe cyane cyane njyewe, ibibazo byose nari nabyibagiwe, nanyuzagamo nkigana abacuranzi nkaririmbira Joy mu matwi agaseka umucyo ugatama aho.
Twakomeje kuvuga byinshi dusoje tuva ku meza dusubira kwicara aho twahoze!
Twakomeje kuzenguruka mu mazi tukitegereza ibyiza Imana yiremeye tugacishamo tukarebana, tukamwenyura ubundi nkamurya amafoto ari nako na we anyishyura.
Twakomereje ku kiriziya aho twasanze Padiri yiteguye, atwakira ku muryango bidatinze cya gihe cyiza kiragera imbere y’Imana Nelson ashyira ikimenyetso cy’urukundo kuri Brendah imbere y’Imana.
Twakomereje muri salle nziza nziza cyane ya hahandi njye na Sacha twaje, amatara amurika neza amurika kuri Nelson na Brendah imisango iratangira umuryango w’umusaza John uzimanira abari baje bawuhekeye.

Uburenganzira bw’Abatinganyi bushyigikiwe cyane n’ibihugu byo mu Burengerazuba bw’isi bifatiye runini ubukungu bw’u Rwanda na Leta y’u Rwanda muri rusange.
Uburenganzira bwo kugira ibitecyerezo no kubigaragaza nta mpungenge z’uko hari uwabikuziza, ni bumwe mu bwisanzure buranga imibanire y’abantu muri demokarasi muri rusange, ariko bukaba bugomba kuranga by’umwihariko urubuga rwa politiki.

Ubushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara na International Daily Journal, bwagaragaje ko ngo abantu bakuru bafata amata buri munsi batagira ikibazo cyo kwibagirwa.
Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye akamaro k’imibonano mpuzabitsina ku bakuze Uko umuntu agenda asaza, usanga hari ibintu byinshi bihinduka ku mubiri we ndetse no mu mitekererere ye.
Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko 76% byâ€™abaherwe bakora imyitozo ngororamubiri, 23% byâ€™abakene ntibayikore.
Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko flavanols ziba muri cocoa zituma umuntu afata mu mutwe ku buryo adapfa kwibagirwa.
Ubushakashatsi bw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’ibarurishamibare ku mibereho y’ingo bwo mu 2015 bwagaragaje ko 59 ku ijana by’abana bo mu Karere ka Nyabihu bafite ikibazo cyo kugwingira, gusa ngo ubu bageze kuri 48%.
Ubushakashatsi bwinshi bwagiye bugaragaza ko umunaniro ukabije no guhangayika bigira uruhare mu kongera ibiro mu buryo budasobanutse.
Ubushakashatsi bwinshi bwagiye bwemeza ko ibiyobyabwenge bituma ubinywa asaza vuba, n’umureba akabona adasa neza.
Ubushakashatsi bw’iyi kaminuza bwerekanye ko umugabo ukimara gushyingirwa aba afite ibipimo by’umubyibuho birenze ibyo abasore bakiri ingaragu bagira bitewe n’imibereho bagira.
Ubushakashatsi kumibereho y’abaturage(EICV) bwashyizwe ahagaragara mu mwaka wa 2011, bwagaragaje Gakenke nka kamwe mu Turere tw’u Rwanda twari dusumbirijwe n’ibibazo by’ubukene muri uwo mwaka no muyindi yawubanjirije.
Ubushakashatsi ni ngombwa mu gufata ibyemezo – IPAR Ikigo cy’Ubushakashatsi n’Isesengurangamba cya IPAR kiravuga ko abashyiraho imirongo migari igamije iterambere bagombye, uko byagenda kose, kuyoborwa n’ubushakashatsi.
Ubushakashyatsi bwerekanye ko abagore n’abakobwa bakunze kwambara inkweto ndende umwanya munini byangiza amagufwa agize ikirenge.
Ubushake bwo gukora imibonano buriyongera.
Ubushakshatsi bwakozwe nâ€™abahanga mu byerekeranye nâ€™imibonano mpuzabitsina, bagaragaje ko amasaha aba abereye bombi, umugabo nâ€™umugore, mu gutera akabariro ari amasaha ya saa yine zâ€™ijoro (22h00).
Ubushinjacyaha bugaragaza ko hari ibikorwa byagaragajwe n’abaregwa ko byakozwe bigatangwaho akayabo nyamara bitarakozwe.
Ubushinjacyaha buhagarariwe n’abashinjacyaha babiri, bukomeje gusobanurira urukiko uko ngo aba bagabo batatu bakoranaga muri MINIRENA, bakoze ibyaha by’itonesha hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Ubushinjacyaha bukomeje ikiciro cyo kwanzura no gusabira ibihano uyu mugabo woherejwe na Danmark kugira ngo aburanishwe ku byaha bya Jenoside akekwaho.
Ubushinjacyaha buravuga ko uwitwa Herve BM, afite ubwenegihugu bw’u Rwanda, akaba yatawe muri yombi kubera gukekwaho uruhare mu bitero biherutse kubera mu Bubiligi.
Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko bwatangiye kumukoraho iperereza mu Gushyingo 2016 umwaka ushize, aho bagiye bumviriza telefoni ye igendanwa bakumva uburyo yagendaga asaba amafaranga abakiriya be ndetse bakanayamuha.
Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko iyo basanze atari ngombwa gukurikirana umuntu babihagarika.
Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko ku wa 20 Mutarama 2017 yahamagawe n’uwitwa Mugemana Theogene amusaba gufunguza abantu bari bafunzwe.
Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko Nyiramahirwe yarangije igihano yagera hanze agasaba Me Nkanika kumusubiza imodoka ye akamubwira ko bamurimo miliyoni 5 yabongereyeho ubwo batangaga za miliyoni 10 zatumye afungurwa ubwa mbere.
Ubushinjacyaha bwabwiye urukiko ko police yavuze ko gucungira umutekano uregwa bigoye ndetse ko bafite impungenge ko ngo ashobobora gutoroka.
Ubushinjacyaha bwagaragarije urukiko ko hari n’ibindi bimenyetso bikomeye birimo izindi nyandiko zo kwa muganga zigaragaza ko nyakwigendera yari yakubiswe bikomeye mu mutwe, ndetse n’igufwa ry’inyuma mu mutwe ryari ryacitse.
Ubushinjacyaha bwakomeje buvuga ko hari igihe yasabye umwanditsi w’urukiko Rukuru Kigali, guhindura itariki y’urubanza, amubwira ko azamuha ku mafaranga y’igihembo cya avoka, aho ngo mu ibazwa rye yabyemeye, aho ngo yamubwiye ko azamusengerera.
Ubushinjacyaha bwamusabiye gufungwa iminsi 30 mu gihe bakomeje gukora iperereza ku byaha aregwa, umwanzuro ukaba uzasomwa kuwa 27 Werurwe 2017 mu Rukiko rwisumbuye rwa Gasabo.
Ubushinjacyaha bwavuze ko hagati ya 2015 na 2017 abakekwa banyereje miliyari 2 530 395 614 Frw.
Ubushinjacyaha bwo bwavugaga ko ibi byose byagiye bifatwaho imyanzuro, bwavuze ko ibyo yasabaga ntacyo byamara muri uru rubanza kuko byakoreshejwe mu zindi manza bityo ko muri uru hari ibyavugiwemo ndetse ko ari na byo bizagenderwaho mu gufata umwanzuro.
Ubushinjacyaha bwo bwavugaga ko kuba yarishyuye bidakuraho ko yakoze icyaha, uyu mukobwa yavuze ko atatoroka igihugu kuko afite ababyeyi ndetse bamwishingira bityo agasaba kurekurwa akaburana ari hanze.
Ubushinjacyaha bwo mu Bubiligi buvuga ko imanza ziregwamo aba banyarwanda batatu zigomba kohererezwa kandi zikaburanishwa n’inkiko zisanzwe (Tribunal correctionnel) aho kugira ngo ziburanishwe na Cour d’assises.
Ubushinjacyaha bw’Umuvunyi buvuga ko ibi byaha byakozwe kuva tariki ya 29 Ugushyingo 2014 ubwo Me Nkanika yunganiraga uwitwa Nyiramahirwe Esperance wari ukurikiranyweho icyaha cyo gucuruza magendu no kunyereza imisoro.
Ubushinjacyaha bw’urwego rw’umuvunyi burega uyu munyamategeko, buvuga ko uregwa atinza nkana urubanza.
Ubushinjacyaha mu kwanzura, bwavuze ko ibyo buvuga bubifitiye gihamya, busaba ko uwo burega afungwa by’agateganyo, uregwa arabigarama asaba kurekurwa.
Ubushinjacyaha ngo bunashingira ku buhamya bwagiye butangwa n’abatswe aya mafaranga.
Ubushinjacyaha ngo mu bindi bimenyesto bwafashe bwavuze ko harimo inkoni, urufunguzo ruhese rufungura amapine y’imodoka byose byuzuye amaraso.
Ubushinwa ariko nabwo Africa ikabwoherereza amabuye y’agaciro n’ibindi bikorwa biva ku mutungo kamere n’ingufu.
Ubushinwa bufasha u Rwanda mu bintu binyuranye birimo inkunga z’amafaranga, inguzanyo ku nyungu nto, ubufasha bwa tekiniki mu bikorwaremezo, bourses z’abanyeshuri, mu by’ubuzima no mu by’ubuhinzi.

Umwe mu bayobozi b’inganda yagize ati “Ku ruhande rw’abanyenganda turabona ko ari igiciro kiri hejuru, ndatekereza ko kizagira n’ingaruka ku giciro fatizo cyo gucuruziho umuceri usohotse mu ruganda.

Umwe mu mihigo y’izi ntore ni “ugukomera ku busugire bw’igihugu tukirindira umutekano”, kandi “umunsi u Rwanda rukeneye ingabo tuzarutabarira,” nk’uko byavuzwe n’ubahagarariye.

“Urebye ibintu bya ngombwa byamaze kujya ku murongo.

Urebye muri iyi myaka irindwi iri kugera ku musozo, ubuyobozi bwarushijweho kwerezwa abaturage, ndetse n’uburyo bwo kwikemurira ibibazo no gutanga ibitekerezo kubibakorerwa.

Uyu mugabo yashakanye n’umugore we muri 2003 babyarana umwana umwe, yakoraga akazi k’ubucuruzi bw’iduka mu cyaro ariko akagira abakiriya benshi kuko abantu bamukundaga bigatuma agira amafaranga amufasha kubaho n’umuryango we.

Uyu mukecuru azwi ho kuba yarashoboye kurokora abantu ariko cyane icyo ashimirwa ni umwana w’uruhinja yarokoye rwari rufite amezi atatu akemera kurwonsa atazi inkomoko yarwo.
Uyu mukecuru wasaniwe inzu, yashimiye abamufashije, abasabira n’Imigisha ku Mana.
Uyu mukecuru w’imyaka 86 wari utuye mu Mudugudu wa Kamuhirwa, Akagari ka Kamurera mu Murenge wa Kamembe, yaguye mu nzira ajyanwa mu bitaro bya Gihundwe.
Uyu mukecuru w’imyaka 96 y’ubukuru ngo buri mugoroba niwe usohoka bwa nyuma mu kabari kitwa Floreal mu gihe abandi bo mu kigero cye baba basinziriye kubera izabukuru.

Uyu muryango ‘Jordan Foundation’ watangijwe na Bahatsi Vanessa wahuye n’ikibazo cyo kubyara umwana ufite ubumuga bwo kutabona akanamuvuza mu mavuriro ashoboka ariko bikanga.
Uyu muryango Jordan Foundation wita ku bana 20 ufite ikicaro mu kagari ka Karuruma, mu murenge wa Gatsata, mu karere ka Gasabo, ni hafi y’ikigo nderabuzima cya Gihogwe.
Uyu muryango ni nawo wamurihiye amashuri yisumbuye ndetse abana nabo kugera aje mu Rwanda mu 1999.
Uyu muryango ntuzibagirwa uyu munsi.
Uyu muryango ufite icyicaro muri Amerika watunze agatoki ubutegetsi bwâ€™u Rwanda ko buhonyora uburenganzira bwa muntu bucecekesha rubanda mu bibazo byâ€™amasambu aho kubikemura uko bikwiye.
Uyu muryango ugeze ku rwego rwo kwakira abanyeshuri 80 biga iyi myuga itandukanye buri mwaka, muri aba biga barimo abagiye barangiza ibyiciro bitandukanye by’amashuri, mu biga muri uyu mwaka harimo uwarangije amasomo ya kaminuza.

Uyu muryango ukora ibikorwa byo gukangurira abantu kureka no kurwanya ibikorwa byâ€™ihohoterwa, ndetse no gufasha abahuye nâ€™ihohoterwa kongera kugaruka mu ubuzima busanzwe.
Uyu muryango urwanyakwegurira ibikorwa abikorera ku giti cyabo na politiki y ubwisanzure bw’amasoko.
Uyu muryango utangaza ko raporo ya nyuma izaba inakubiyemo ibyifuzo-nama by’uko amatora yazajya akorwa mu myaka iri imbere nibishobora kuzahinduka cyangwa kongerwamo.
Uyu muryango utegura ibiganiro bihuza abayobozi ba USA na Israel ku rwego nshingamategeko na nyubahiriza-tegeko, hagashimangirwa cyane ingingo zihuza ibihugu byombi n’uburyo USA ifite inyungu mu kuba Israel yaba ifite imbaraga kandi itekanye.
Uyu muryango uvuga ko utabujije abantu kurya inyama zitukura, ngo ariko bagabanye ingano yazo mu ifunguro ryabo.
Uyu muryango wageze kuri byinshi bitandukanye birimo ibikorwa 20 mu bihugu bya Afurika birimo ivuriro ryâ€™amaso i Dakar muri Senegal rimaze kubaga uburwayi bwâ€™amaso bugera kuri 800 rinasuzuma ibihumbi 16 (16,000) nta kiguzi.
Uyu muryango wanatubwiye ko imvura nyinshi iherutse kugwa yasenye inzu babagamo ubu bimwe mu bintu byabo bikaba bibitswe n’abaturanyi ; ntibafite n’aho kujya nyuma yo kuva mu bitaro.
Uyu muryango wasenyutse kubera impamvu zirimo kuba abaturage bataragishwaga inama mu ishyirwaho rya gahunda z’umuryango n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryazo.

Yabihuje n’ibyo Minisitiri Louise Mushikiwabo ushinzwe ububanyi n’amahanga aherutse gutangaza, avuga ko bidakwiye gusaba uburenganzira mbere yo kwandika ku mbuga nkoranyambaga mu matora.
Yabihuje n’igihe u Rwanda rwari mu bihe rukeneye inkunga y’ibiribwa, ugasanga igihugu kimwe cyemeye gutanga miliyoni 50 z’amadolari, rimwe abantu bakibwira ko ari amafaranga kizatanga, ariko bwacya kigatangaza ko ari kontineri z’ibiribwa gishaka kuzana.
Yabijeje amashanyarazi kandi ngo azabageraho byihuse, ariko ngo na bo bamwihutishirize kumva neza, gukorera hamwe.
Yabijeje ko amashanyarazi, amazi ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa remezo bizakomeza kubegerezwa kugira ngo bigire uruhare mu kuzamura imibereho y’abatuye aka karere.
Yabijeje ko hagomba gukorwa ibishoboka byose ubuzima bw’umunyarwanda bukaba bwiza kurushaho nk’uko abyifuza.
Yabijeje ubufasha bwose bazakenera kugira ngo ishoramari ryabo ribahe umusaruro uko babiteganyije.
Yabitangaje ejo kuwa Kane ubwo yasozaga umwiherero wa 14 wâ€™abayobozi bâ€™igihugu wari umaze icyumweru ubera mu kigo cya gisirikare i Gabiro mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Yabitangarije mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa 6 Gashyantare 2017, ubwo hatangizwaga ibikorwa by’icyumweru byo kurwanya ruswa mu nkiko, bizageza tariki ya 10 Gashyantare.
Yabitangiriye mu Karere ka Musanze, akomereza i Nyabihu, asoreza i Rubavu. 16:50: “Dukomereze aha, no mu bikorwa bindi biri imbere dushaka gukora, duhere kuri buri muntu, kuri buri rugo, duhere ku Karere nka Rubavu n’igihugu cyose.
Yabivugiye mu muhango wo kwibuka abakozi b’iyi minisiteri n’urwego rw’ubuzima muri rusange bazize jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi igahitana abasaga miliyoni imwe.
Yabivugiye mu nama ya 16 ngarukamwaka y’abashakashatsi mpuzamahanga ku bijumba iteraniye mu Rwanda, aho biga uko bakomeza guteza imbere iki gihingwa.
Yabivuze abinyujije mu itangazo yashyize ahagaragara.
Yabivuze arenga mu muryango n’imyenda yazanye yagiye atayijyanye ndetse n’impamba ntayo yasabye, mbonye bimeze gutyo, nafashe imfunguzo nkinga inzu nkurikira abandi.
Yabivuze kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 14 Nyakanga 2017, ubwo we n’ishyaka rye batangirizaga ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza mu Karere ka Rusizi mu Burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda.
Yabivuze muri rusange, noneho aduhobera aduha ibihembo, angezeho yarankomeje, numva ndashyigikiwe, nti ‘niba nshyigikiwe rero ngomba gukomera nkakora uko nshoboye.”
Yabivuze ubwo yaganirizaga Abisilamu bizihizaga umunsi mukuru wa Eid mu Musigiti wa Esjid Riadha mu Mujyi wa Moshi mu Ntara ya Kilimanjaro.
Yabivuze ubwo yagiraga icyo avuga ku yindi modoka yo mu bwoka bwa RAV4 yibwe, ikaba yarafatiwe ku mupaka wa Rusizi ku italiki 11 Kamena ubwo yageragezaga kwinjira mu Rwanda.
Yabizeje kurandura imirire mibi Perezida Kagame yabanje kubwira imbaga nini cyane y’abaturage baje kumwakira ko aho u Rwanda ruvuye bahazi kandi bazi n’aho bagana.
Yaboneyeho gusaba ibihugu byose kongera ingufu mu bushakashatsi ku bumenyi bw’indi mibumbe iri mu kirere kugira ngo higwe uko abantu bayituraho ibintu bitaragera ahabi kurushaho.
Yaboneyeho gushima ubuyobozi bwa Polisi yâ€™u Rwanda uburyo bukomeza kuba ikipe hafi muri byose maze avuga ko intego izakomeza kuba igikombe kuri Police FC.
Yaboneyeho kandi umwanya wo kubwira abatuye Gambia ko igihugu cye kizakomeza kubaba hafi mu bibazo barimo kugira ngo babisohokemo mu mahoro.
Yaboneyeho kugira inama abaturage gutunga za kizimyamwoto bakwitabaza bibaye ngombwa mbere yâ€™uko haza abashinzwe kuzimya umuriro.
Yabonye amanota ane kuri atandatu.
Yabonye atabivamo gukomeza kuburana amahugu akura ikirego munkiko, urukiko rumutegeka kwishyura amafaranga ibihumbi 500.000frw none ubu yarabuze arashakishwa ngo yishyure ayo mafaranga.
Yabwiraga abagize inzego z’ibanze zose zikorera mu Murenge wa Ngoma mu Karere ka Huye ubwo baganiraga ku bintu bihungabanya umutekano.
Yabwiye abapolisi ati “ Ntimugomba kudohoka, yewe ntimukwiye no kwizera ibicucu byanyu”.
Yabwiye abaturage ko ashaka ko ubuso bahingaho umuceri buva kuri 50%.
Yabwiye abaturage ko azageza amazi mu ngo kandi agafasha abahinzi kuhira no mu gihe cy’izuba bakajya bahinga.
Yabwiye Daily Mail ko abakoresheje ubu buryo benshi barakomeretse.
Yabwiye ikigo gishinzwe iby’ingendo muri Australia (ATSB) ko yari asinziriye ari kumva indirimbo mu gihe cy’amasaha agera ari abiri nyuma aza kumva zituritse bitewe na batiri ya telefone.
Yabwiye itangazamakuru ko gushaka ibyangombwa rwari urugendo rukomeye cyane cyane bigeze ku gushaka imikono, nibura y’abantu 12 muri buri karere.
Yabwiye Izubarirashe.rw ati “Dushatse fanta yo kunywa cyangwa igitoki cyo kurya turabibuze, kugira ngo umuntu abone icyo afata byamusaba kujyaiI Ngarama kandi ni kure.”

Yabwiye polisi ko yari amaze inshuro ebyiri afatana umugore we nâ€™abandi bagabo mbere yâ€™uko ahitamo ku mwica.
Yabwiye The Independent ati” Iyo mbeba ntisanzwe, nawe se mu rugo mfite injangwe n’imbwa yo mu bwoko bwa Jack Russell, iyo mbeba irabiruta kure ubishyize hamwe.”
Yabwiye urubyiruko rwitabiriye icyo gikorwa ko ibiyobyabwenge bitera uwabinyoye kwishora mu ngeso mbi nk’ubusambanyi bukurikirwa n’ingaruka zirimo kwandura zimwe mu ndwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina no gutwara inda zitateganyijwe.
Yabyaye umwana wa mbere ageze mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri abanza kuko yari yarize nabi, yahise ava mu ishuri ubu ntazi gusoma no kwandika, ndetse no kugira ngo amenye igihe yavukiye cyangwa igihe abana be bavukiye abanza kuzana ibyangombwa ukirebera.
Yaciye muri Marine FC imyaka ibiri 2015 na 2016, mbere yo gutungurana agasinyishwa na APR FC tariki 14 Nyakanga 2016.
Yaduhaye amahirwe yo kubana na yo iteka ryose.
Yaduhaye amashanyarazi, aduha inka ubu turanywa amata, umutekano ni wose, imihanda yaraharuwe, VUP yazihaye abantu rwose Imana izamuhe umugisha azatuyobore kugeza igihe Imana izamwitwarira.”
Yadukorera umuhanda wa Nzove ujya Rutonde ukagera i Ruli agashyiramo kaburimbo, ndetse ku Kigo Nderabuzima cya Rutonde akaduha ibitaro.”
Yadukuye kure tugeze aheza, ntaho itatuvanye, kandi ntaho yananirwa kutugeza.
Yadusabye kujya mu nzira tukabwiriza abantu,kugeza igihe azagaruka ku munsi w'imperuka (Matayo 24:14).
Yadusize gutyo maze twunama hasi ngo turuhuke hashize akanya Kiki aba arasetse, araseka arongera araseka tuyoberwa ikibaye.
Yafashe umwanzuro wo kumuhungira mu mahunga ariko aza kugaruka Umugabo avuga ko byamushobeye agahita afata umwanzuro wo guhunga urugo ajya muri Kenya agira ngo abone amahoro.
Yafashwe ku wa Gatanu, amaze gufatwa yahise afungirwa hariya kuri Sitasiyo ya Gahunga.”
Yafashwe yiba mu rusengero kwa Rugagi ajyanwa hagati mu iteraniro arambikwaho ibiganza.
Yafatiwe ku mupaka muto uhuza u Rwanda na Congo, uru rumogi akaba yari yaruhishe mu bihaza by’amadegede ariko yabikuyemo imbuto.
Yafunzwe kuva kuri 20 Mata 1995 afungurwa kuwa 23 Mata 2010 arangije imyaka yari yarakatiwe.
Yagaragaje kandi ko bahura nâ€™imbogamizi zitandukanye zirimo nkâ€™abafatabuguzi usanga baza gukosoza inyemezabwishyu zabo zâ€™imyaka yashize kandi nyamara amafaranga yazo aba yaramaze kubarwa mu mutungo wâ€™iki kigo.
Yagaragaje kandi ko igitekerezo gishingiye kuri matter kandi ko kitahinduka hatariho matter.
Yagaragaje kandi n’icyo abakundana bakore kugira ngo iki cyaha bakineshe.
Yagaragaje ko abagore bakoze akazi gakomeye na nyuma ya jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, mu rugendo rwo kongera kubaka igihugu.
Yagaragaje ko guhindura imyumvire Abanyafurika bazabikura ahandi, avuga ko ahubwo ari ibintu bigomba kubaturukamo ubwabo.
Yagaragaje ko hakiri impungenge zo kuba muri uyu mugabane nta bushobozi bwo kwitunganyiriza imitungo kamere.
Yagaragaje ko iki gikorwa gishingiye ku bikorwa Perezida Paul Kagame yahize byo gushyigikira imiyoborere igamije kwimakaza ubumwe n’ubunyarwanda.
Yagaragaje ko umusaruro w’imbere mu gihugu (Gross Domestic Product) wazamutse ugera kuri tiliyari 1,377 z’Amafaranga ugereranije na tiliyari 1,282 z’amafaranga yo mu gihembwe cya mbere cya 2014.
Yagarutse kandi ku ihakana rya Jenoside aho yavuze ko hakenewe gushyira hamwe ngo iki kibazo kirwanwe kandi ntikigire undi muryango gishingamo imizi.
Yagarutse ku banenze ubufatanye bwabo na FPR muri aya matora, avuga ko umubano wa PSD na FPR Inkotanyi umaze imya 25, aho ngo ababyifuzaga ukundi kuri bo ntacyo bibabwiye kuko atari abayoboke babo.
Yagarutse ku banyamahanga banenga ibyo Abanyarwanda bamaze kugeraho n’abandi banyarwanda bashaka kugendera mu nzira mbi z’ababoshya.
Yagarutse ku bikorwa remezo byo muri aka gace nk’umuhanda wa Kayonza – Kagitumba ugana ku mupaka wa Tanzania, ukaba wari warangiritse ariko ubu uri gukorwa kandi ngo uzaba ari mugari kuruta uko wahoze.
Yagarutse ku byo u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho biruhesha ijambo ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Yagarutse ku mateka y’u Rwanda rwabohowe n’ingabo zahoze ari iza RPA mu 1 994, akavuga ko urugamba rw’amasusasu rwarangiye ariko ko urwo guhangana n’ibiyobyabwenge rukwiye kurwanwa na buri muturage.
Yagarutse ku nkongi yafashe kiriya gice cya Pariki ya Nyungwe agira ati," Pariki ziri mu biteza imbere igihugu.
Yagarutse ku ntego za RPF zagaragajwe ko zizibandwaho mu gihe iri shyaka rizaba ryatsinze amatora kuko umukandida waryo yagaragaje ko ashoboye.
Yagarutse kuri politiki y’umukandida Kagame yo kwita ku byiciro by’abakene kugira ngo nabo bazamukane n’abandi bagere kure mu iterambere zirimo; VUP, ubudehe, Girinka, Mutuweli, uburezi kuri bose, kuvugurura ubuhinzi n’izindi.
Yagaruwe muri USA ku wa kabiri w’Icyumweru gishize mu gikorwa Koreya ya Ruguru yise ko ari icy’ubugiraneza kuko yari arwaye amerewe nabi.

Yakomeje avuga ko ihame ry’uburinganire ari inshingano za buri wese, aho buri wese mu murimo akora aba akwiye kumva ko bimureba ndetse agaharanira ko ryagerwaho ndetse bakagira uruhare mu kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.

Yakomeje avuga ko Kagame afite amateka akomeye mu Rwanda cyane cyane mu guhagarika Jenoside no kurugarurira icyizere n’icyerekezo ku buryo abantu bashobora kumwigiraho byinshi.
Yakomeje avuga ko kandi mu bihe byashize wasangaga kugira ngo umuntu yivuze amaso byarasabaga gutegereza igihe kirekire kubera ko abaganga bari bake kandi wakwandikirwa indorerwamo ukajya kuzigura mu mujyi.
Yakomeje avuga ko kandi ubu inzu zigiye kubakwa zishyirwa mu byiciro inzu hakurikijwe ingaruka zishobora kugira, ibi bikaba bigaragaza ubwoko bw’izigomba gukorerwa ipimwa ry’ubutaka.

Yakomeje avuga ko kugeza ubu basanze muri izo miliyoni 200 Frw hasigaye kuri konti miliyoni 20 Frw gusa, ariko bari gukurikirana ayarengejwe.
Yakomeje avuga ko kuva mu mwaka wa 2013 uru rubyiruko rw’abakorerabushake rumaze kugera ku bihumbi 60 anashimangira ko bafite intego y’uko mu 2020 bazaba bageza kuri miliyoni imwe.

Yatanze ingero za bimwe mu bihugu byo mu mahanga, aho umuntu akora amakosa mu kazi agahita yirukanwa nta kuzuyaza kuko ngo haba hari benshi bafite ubumenyi nk’ubwe benshi biteguye kuba bamusimbura.
Yatanze ubutumwa bw’uko aha hantu hatewe iki giti, hagomba kwibutsa abantu bose ko bakwiye guharanira amahoro no gufatanya muri iyi si bose batuyeho.
Yatanze urugero kuri Nigeria, aho nko kuva mu 2003-2009 igihugu cyateye imbere mu mibare, ariko umubare wâ€™abakene ukiyongera kurushaho.
Yatanze urugero rw’abana bato bari aha bashobora kuzasimbura bamwe mu bayobozi bo mu nzego zo hejuru, akavuga ko ari bo bari kuba abakiliya b’uyu mucuruzi w’urumogi.
